But a weak script, weaker story, surprisingly bad acting from ruffalo, poor visual effects, lacklustre ending.It's not terrible but it's not good, it probably just edges out of bad into okay territory.

title: FANTASTIC
text: Its been years and very few movies from Hollywood that have had nothing but senseless killing and Apocoliptical end of days.Finally a Family friendly movie with humor,action,Good feelings and family interaction.A movie for all ages to enjoy.Its to the point that people have to watch movies from other countries in order get Family Oriented movies with feelings and good old fashioned morals that the Whole family can enjoy.

title: Decent for Kids
text: The Adam Project is not to be Taken Seriously. It is more of a Comedic Movie. It does have Cheesy Fight Scenes that take it down a few notches. This is more of a 10 & under movie for kids.

title: Ignore all the bad reviews.
text: If you grew up in the eighties,you will love this movie. This movie brought me back there. I loved it! It had all the ingredients for a nostalgic trip back to my childhood.

title: Meh....
text: Watchable.That all I can say. Don't make a plan around this movie though.Ryan Reynolds plays himself as an adult and a kid. He's great, the kid is great, but the story misses a lot.Cheers.

title: Have Time, Will Travel
text: Time travel in movies is invariably a fascinating sub-genre. This one is no exception. It's both thrilling and really funny for a sci-fi movie, which is surprising in itself.Ryan Reynolds and Walter Scobeli hit it off together beautifully. It's a real treat seeing them together on-screen exchanging witty dialogue. The rest of the cast doesn't disappoint either.Aside from the fast pace, another wow factor is the design of the magnetic particle accelerator as well as the futuristic time-travelling jets. High five for the set designer.Watch it now. Later may be too late.

title: FLAT AND BORING
text: The story is the same time travel thing, movie is too flat and i slept 3 times trying to watch this one. It has one of the worst villain i had ever seen, they put 0 effort in writing, this is one of the worst scifi and time travel movie i had ever seen and probable the worst film of ryan reynolds.

title: my new favorite
text: By far one of the best movies i've seen. I don't usually like movies, i find them hard to sit through. This movie had me laughing, smiling, angry, then back to laughing. Absolutely adorable. 100/100.

title: Disney meets E.T. - Best family movie in a long time!
text: Funny, action, clean, and top production quality.Ryan Reynolds was less cheesy, but still so deadpan funny.The Soundtrack was great.And the ensemble together fit perfectly.A bit corny/over-dramatic in a couple of places places, but besides that, a perfect family movie.

title: Movie Premyy Honest Review
text: The Adam Project is adventurous, emotional and talks about warm holes, time travel, future technology, etc. It has to be funny and humorous as it features the amazing Ryan Reynolds. Highlights: The chemistry between Ryan and Walker; both being Adam of different ages, Action, Dialogues, and Family Relationships. It is not that bad nor the best but it will keep you entertained throughout its duration. Highly recommended! 😄

title: A perfect film (for the dumb netflix audience)
text: The pointless effects looked great but the movie must have been written by the 12 year old kid from the movie. Can't understand how movies like these get over 5 stars.

title: If you don't cry
text: At the end... Then you're not human. I absolutely love this movie. It had action, suspense, drama and comedy. Ryan Reynolds has excellent comedic timing but can deliver a tear jerking scene right after 😢💔

title: I couldn't get past Jennifer Garner's wooden acting.
text: I don't have a grudge against her, why would I? But Jennifer Garner is not a good actor. I guess she's gotten by with other appeal, but I couldn't watch an actor who is clearly acting like they are acting, doesn't seem comfortable in their own skin, and almost seems like they don't know how real people behave. I really can't handle that reaction she has, it's always the same. Garner has a palette of maybe 3 or 4 different emotions to work with. Sorry, but I couldn't get past this. She was good in Alias, but something like 16 Going On 30 was terrifically cringeworthy, for instance.The premise is fine, and I may go back and just skip the scenes with Garner in them. I expect pulpy science fiction over quirky gags from Reynolds, but perhaps I'll be pleasantly surprised.

title: Lovely film with important message
text: The dialogue between the characters is very good in this film. It's natural, funny and serious in the right moments. Nowadays a lot of films in this genre often miss the mark when it comes to jokes.The plot was simple, but the stories of the characters gave it depth. Every character had a purpose and was very believable.Overall a very enjoyable film for the whole family!

title: I couldn't finish watching it
text: The netflix movies are becoming embarassing.The story is ridiculous and moronic Ryan Reynolds cheesy jokes are getting tiring and its becoming a challenge to finish his movies.Has he only 1 character?I couldnt finish watching it because my brain was aching.Give it a miss unless you are about to be lobotomized.Where have all the great story writers gone?Bring back some decent sci fi story writers, Heinlein, Wells, Le Guin etc.Surely there are a plethora of stories to pick from beside this rubbish.Netflix is lowering the intelligence level of humanity with this crap.

title: A funny time travelling movie.
text: Another time travel movie but a good one this time. The story isn't really original but the plot is entertaining and there are some good funny moments, mostly due to the excellent acting of Ryan Reynolds. He has shown us by now that these kind of movies are right up his alley. Movies like the excellent The Voices, The Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard, The Hitman's Bodyguard, the 2 Deadpools or even Red Notice, all show us Ryan Reynolds at his best, funny replies are almost a trademark for him now. In The Adam Project you also have some good acting from the young Walker Scobell playing the early version of Ryan Reynolds. They worked well together, it's all pleasant to follow. This movie is just a lighthearted sci-fi/adventure movie, one that won't disappoint a lot of people, unless you're never satisfied, and we all know there are a bunch of people like that.

title: I wish I could go back in time and stop myself watching this.
text: That's it. That's the review.IMDB says I need to write more but I can't think of anything else. Erm, the scene they copied from Return of the Jedi reminded me of Star Wars? And the bit from Independence day looked worse than that 25 year old film?

title: Sci-fi + Time Travel.. I'm in..
text: One of the best Time Travel movie. The concept is Beautiful. 😍 Ryan and kid Ryan are Amazing and Mark completes them. I really hope my future kid watches this and just feel a connection with me, in future. That's lame, i know. But damn it, who cares. I'm drunk.😅😂✨

title: Enjoyable film but I found the relationship with the boy quite odd
text: Yes, enjoyable, just leave your brain on the seat next to you. The usual not complicated SyFy time travel fun story, but.. I found the relationship between the 12yo boy and his parents very odd! In fact, he was unusual to me.Although not credited with being super smart or gifted in some way, this child is quick witted, silver tounged and able to converse with adults better than we can!His relationship with his parents and the way they treat and speak with him is as an equal and on a level that I wasn't comfortable with.I realise this is the age of internet and over awareness, but this film shows me how children of this time, have been forced to become adults and deal with adult theme and issues due to our technological surroundings, and that the innocence of childhood is over too soon!

title: Great movie!
text: This movie was funny, smart, action packed and even had a few sweet moments...definitely worth a watch! Ryan Reynolds and Mark Ruffalo were amazing, as usual, but Walker Scobell (who played young Adam) was incredible!

title: Meh
text: You can hate my review but hear me out... As far as science fiction genre as a whole goes, the movie was meh. Not quite kid friendly but not really fit for adults either. I respect Ryan Reynolds but sometimes his humor or "larger-than-life persona" is over the top and in this case it was. I was personally wishing the movie might have ended faster but was stuck watching it with some friends! The overall story, climax, falling action, etc. Are pretty monotonous and employs overused themes. Mark Ruffalo, out of reverence, prevented me from downgrading the movie to a 4, I think. Not the worst movie out there, far from that.

title: Wonderful movie
text: I think most of the bad reviewers about this movie don't understand the purposes of a movie. Movie is supposed to make you entertained enjoy while watching and have a good time watching it and this movie does just that . It was fun and entertaining. Personally I don't think a movie is required to be 100% accurate in scientifically to enjoy a movie and have a good time. Only the movie reviewers will look for theses kind of scientific errors in a movie not an average viewer. So ignore all the bad reviews and go ahead and watch this movie i will guarantee you will not be disappointed ( sorry for my English im not a native English speaker)

title: I love Ryan Reynolds and Mark Ruffalo, but they are both in better films.
text: I found myself really bored with the "action" scenes in this film...so much so that I was more interested in my phone, which is a shame because I really do like both Ryan Reynolds and Mark Ruffalo.The dialogue between young Adam and old Adam was fun...but don't make up for the decidedly lacking plot and boring CGI action scenes.I think this film would be good as a tame family film and long as you are comfortable with a certain level of violence...otherwise check out other movies starring Ryan Reynolds and Mark Ruffalo, who both are truly fantastic and can deliver great lines that often have me in stitches.Growing up big Adam's theme song was used to advertise for Molson Canadian...so it was the perfect theme song for pilot Ryan Reynolds!

title: Loved it!
text: Great movie, beginning to end. From a director that knows how to capture and mesmerize. The cinematography is beautiful, the music nostalgic, touching and perfect. Honestly the best performance of Ryan Reynolds yet. The architecture, inner house design (main character's house) and music all gave credence to the 70's-80's, while tying it to 2022 was strange, but perhaps some didn't pick that up. Still though, a wonderful movie!

title: Netflix at its best
text: Wow this was a great film with a great cast and a fun ride and a good story. This film will captivate and hold your attention from start to finish.. this is Ryan at his best hands down bravo.

title: He's not going to be cute forever!
text: Mr. Reynolds had better start choosing his projects more carefully (or have someone else choose them if this is the best he can do). His stinkers are starting to outweigh his quality work by quite a margin, and minus his abs and charisma, would be nothing but flaming piles of cinema. I really like Ryan as an actor, but this movie is a standard connect the dots, "going through the motions" affair with bland, unconvincing performances. I'm not even a casual time travel theorist, but this plot seems to be problematic in so many ways. Throw in some splashy special effects, a non-threatening villain, and tie it up with a pretty ribbon of a happy ending and you've got this movie...or the Free Guy, or The Proposal,or Red Notice, or The Hitman's Wife's Body Guard, or...you get the idea.

title: Great Movie all around
text: This movie is an absolute 10. If you think anything different, you're and idiot. Action, comedy, time travel, emotional connection to characters, references. Yes the cgi isn't the best on one character but that doesn't change how good this movie is.

title: Ryan Reynolds can not carry the whole movie upon his shoulders
text: Producers are casting Ryan Reynolds as the Deadpoll charachter in every movie. He s the funny, snappy, vain, not-caring-about-anything kind of guy. But that doesnt work in every movie and even if it did, that wouldnt be enough to make it an enjoyable experience.They just thought : lets just get Ryan and his joker persona, give him a kid co-star and throw in a woman who will be the maing guys love interest. The plot makes no sense and feels forced, the dialogue is not funny or engaging and the charachters feel shallow. The cast is very good, but they were poorly utilized.Why was Deadpoll a lot better movie compared to this ?A lot funnier because the jokes were original and elaborate with numerous references. Dialogue was constantly having you involved and the plot was otherwise simple, but they made it work because the characters had depth - the good guy wasnt that good, and the bad guy wasnt that bad, so it wasnt one dimensional. Plus the action and the soundtrack were considerably better.In conclusion - not that entertaining and not so much fun.

title: Another Time travel movie
text: As always every time travel movie has their own concept of how the whole thing works. I gave up understanding it because nobody actually knows it instead I enjoy the movie and think from their perspective.Walker Scobell delivered an amazing performance. I loved his performance along with Ryan Reynolds.It is an entertaining movie with great humour and emotional scenes. I laughed through the whole movie.Kuddos to the cast and Netflix.

title: Netflix Wonders why their Stock Plummeted
text: Lots of woke casting. Nice to see mixed marriages in the future. The story plot is ok, although the opening scene was a complete rip off off ET, to the point they are luck if Steven Spielberg doesn't sue them - they they even had the exact same Golden Retriever. Then they ripped off Star Wars with a light saber staff, hopefully George Lucas doesn't sue them.

title: Let My Love Gimme Some Lovin'
text: The music is all wrong. Gimme Some Lovin', by The Spender Davis group, is from 1966. Let My Love Open The Door is from 1980. I'm 55, and this all works for me, but it shouldn't be on a the soundtrack for a movie where Mark Ruffalo's character is 44.But that all falls under, Who Cares? Probably nobody.This was immensely enjoyable, and presents a slightly different look at time travel. Good performances all around and the special effects were excellent.

title: Easy movie to spend 2 hours
text: I liked it. It is entertaining, funny and sometimes stupid. Easy movie to spend 2 hours in the evening.Ryan Reynolds is Ryan Reynolds everywhere. Here he is a bit sad and too old, but still performing.Walker Scolbell was surprisingly nice. It was a pleasure to look at him in this movie.For my taste, they invited a good cast, but story worth nothing.I decided not to think at all watching it: there time travel concept is not viable. Plus, I don't understand this part about the wife. She is just doing things to push the story forward.To conclude: this is a nice movie if you have nothing to do, like Ryan Reynolds and have existing subscription to Netflix.

title: Always done a great act and story Ryan
text: I seriously Loved it and the characters werr so amazingly acted and story line were awesome like i always have hopes with Ryan and it got fulfilled too.....all the best guys..................

title: Twilight Zone with a twist

title: I HAVE ONE QUESTION!
text: How come Jessica Bodenarek played young Adam?When?Which scene!IMDB sould explain!I can not fine it!!!!!!!!!!..........................I mean this movie is a 2022 movie .. how come!

title: Nice movie
text: The Adam project is an enjoyable adventure. Great performance:Rayan Reynolds, Mark Ruffalo, Jennifer Garner and the boy , they did a great performance. I loved that sci-fi movie.

title: An average but entertaining movie
text: After being able to manipulate time travel, Adam accidentally finds his twelve year-old self of 2022, and together they will have to find the way to go back in time and prevent time traveling from existing in the first place. To do this, they will have to find their deceased father, whose death they are still grieving, while running away from time travel guardians because of breaking so many rules.The storyline is not exactly the most original, as the time travel cliche has been used thousands of times before, which makes the movie extremely average and non memorable at all. I do not think it was smartly written, since there are so many gaps in the plot, but at the same time, I understand that the movie and its genre are not supposed to be so deep and just something to watch to spend some of your leisure time.Even though it is not top tier comedy, Ryan Reynolds' character has a wacky and sarcastic sense of humor that made me raise a smirk from time to time, but it is not the most original character and not in the slightest offbeat. In my opinion he is such an amazing actor, and it angers me that he participates in such an ordinary movie that some can consider american trash tv.The movie attempted to be emotionally engaging with the son mourning his passed away father, and even though it was not extremely moving, it added a nice touch to the sci-fi comedy.

title: Great fun! Very entertaining
text: Great movie, so nice to see a movie that is just a fun movie WITHOUT any politics. Ryan Reynolds always delivers, it's just good fun. It's what movies (like this) are supposed to be - entertaining.SO glad there was not one bit of "virtue signaling", so nice to see something normal for those of us who are sick of having wokeness crammed down our throats. Too many movies / tv series have been ruined by that, just glad to see there are some wanting to make movies for the rest of us.

title: Feels like I am watching a 200's movie, high in details but bad in story. Good character developing loop.
text:
OK special effect, what is because of the timeline. Even though they could have done better work instead of relying too much on it. It is not that painful to see, but does lean on the edge of it.Music is OK but just a bit low quality due to low innovativeness, this is also lines and script
Ugg, the script is almost 90-2000's too old school.Love the small humor elements, but sometimes it take it too much, matching the character what is pity because he is the only one that doing the jokes instead the whole movie does it.Action are dump really the same age as the script, even some acting
Do like the amount of details and make it logic again
The amount of details is done above average
A nice element that they have put in is the involvement of the past and future him and his character. Well-made.The men chemistry is really nice, love it.The metal parts are limited, should be more also the door should be the strongest part of the building, but it breaks the easiest.Good plot, easy but good because of some innovativeness.Strange enough, the ending of the machine is much easier than expected.... thought the second scenario will kick in.Ugh love the ball play great work but hate the meeting with his lover moment because it should be different... especially with the dramatic saying goodbye scene.

title: Review
text: This movie was great shawn levy did it again!!!!!! Ryan rynolds was fantastic!!! The action scenes were great and it was a good story. The ending was fantastic but emotional. It was a great father and son movie.

title: The Adam Midject
text: This is the worst Ryan Reynolds movie since Free Guy, it's a bland, disappointing, unfunny, and painfully average sci-fi movie that never made me laugh and did nothing for Ryan Reynolds's career, it has more plot holes than Free Guy and it tries to be funny but just comes off as cringe.Hulk is Deadpool's father, Elektra is Adam's mother, and Gamora is Deadpool's wife, I love these actors but my favorite would have to be Mark Ruffalo, he was great in the film and Ryan Reynolds was pretty good too but it had too much going on and too little time to do it, and it also has one of the worst lines of dialogue I've heard in a Ryan Reynolds movie in the 3rd act, I was cringing so hard.I'm gonna give The Adam Midject a C.

title: Excellent
text: I enjoyed near everything about this movie. The action was excellent, the fight choreography was well done to the point that you forget that it's choreographed, and the CGI was spot on minus some digital de-aging that could have been better. The interactions between characters ranged from downright hilarious at times to heartfelt and poignant at others. I thought it was well paced, well written, well directed and well acted. I found myself interested and engaged in the movie through it's full runtime which for me is extremely rare.

title: Offers nothing new
text: Meh. The Adam Project is a stale science fiction movie infused with some mediocre comedy.Negatives: The movie struggles a little to tell the story and the fight and action scenes are underwhelming. I was expecting way more because of the way the movie started. The movie lacks science fiction, and is overall lame and uninteresting, offering nothing new to the table. Even if you turn your brain off to watch this movie, it will still be mediocre.Positives: Good CGI. OK cast. Sort of works as a family movie.Want some good sci fi? Turn on something else. Want some good comedy? Turn on something else. Want a movie that can entertain you properly? Turn on something else. Want a movie that can entertain your children? This might be for you.4.5/10.

title: Don't listen to the haters..
text: This movie is funny from the beginning to the end. The plot was good and the time travel line they created made sense. It didn't feel all over the place like some movies. Ryan Reynolds delivered for sure.

title: Phenomenal- needed to leave a review.
text: Saw the movie first instead of looking at the reviews and I absolutely loved it. I was engaged from start to finish. The effects and the storyline was just bang on.

title: Dont fall for the hype
text: Its a cliched sci fi movie at best. Every frame and every dialogue in this movie, you would have seen in some other movie for sure.One thing to definetely admire is the social media campaign from the team to promote this movie. It definetely made me think as if i was going to watch the next avengers or next big thing lol.

title: lovely wee movie
text:
Didn't expect much from this...but was pleasantly surprised. This movie had a lot of heart and I really enjoyed it,
This almost felt like a kind of 80s movie to me.

title: Ryan Reynolds being Ryan Reynolds
text: What's there to say about this movie? Not much. Ryan playing himself and cliched writing. Everything in this movie has been done before and there's zero new stuff here.I like Ryan though, so I sat through it even though the movie wasn't anything special. This is a movie you watch once and a year later can't even remember if you've seen it before or not.

title: Absolutely Fun and Exciting wow - wow
text: The Adam Project What a refreshing science fiction / cosmic movie...wow. Well written with great comedic timing from the 12 year old actor and Ryan Reynolds. With a film rock music score that Rocks exceptionally with the Star Wars like dark mechanical characters..and the flying ships .. Worth watching and great dialogue...thank you Netflix.

title: Ideas From Other Movies Patched Together
text: The issue with this movie is that there wasn't one aspect or even scene really that was original. Every scene I can recall another movie where the exact same thing happened. Ryan Reynolds plays a similar role to the one that he always plays. Some of his jokes hit and others can get annoying. As for cast selection I suppose they did a decent job of finding a kid that one could imagine Ryan Reynolds character to be like when he was younger. The worst part of the movie was some of the sets, the backgrounds look so fake in many parts it looks like old movies where the backgrounds were painted.Time travel movies now are such a common setting and there are so many other movies that have done it better. The movie may provide some laughs throughout , but doing this review even a couple days after viewing it , it is already hard to think of any part that will be memorable a week from now.

title: Wonderful
text: Normally I find a little Ryan Reynolds goes a long way and I'm not a fan of precocious child characters, but here I'll make an exception. This is just delightful.

title: Overlong with Characters Verbally Abusing Each Other
text: More of something doesn't necessarily make it better.An overlong, barely above average film that might have been better as 95 minute movie. This has an LOL factor of zero. Meaning, I never laughed out loud one time and rarely even chuckled on the inside.Can anyone tell me why modern screenplays are filled with characters who treat each other like crap and constantly verbally abuse each other?Are we really a society who communicate with abrasive one liners and leave all interactions unapologetically unresolved???Maybe so. Maybe that's why YouTube videos of people arguing and fighting in public get millions of views.The Adam Project is highly derivative with slightly above average casting, however, as much as I like Mark Ruffalo, he felt a little miscast as the father of Adam...errrr...Adams.Nearly every actor in this film is playing the exact same character they've played before.Reynolds the wise cracking antihero.Saldana the butt kicking heroine (and diversity hire for this film)Ruffalo the reluctant scientist caught between ethical and personal decisions.It would have been nice to see the wonderful Catherine Keener play more than a one note bad guy, but who has time for character development in a movie filled with characters we've already seen before....many times.This is neither a heartfelt sci-fi flick or a dedicated comedy and ultimately fails trying to be both.It's a passable, overlong Netflix film with no real longevity and makes barely a blip in the noisy and chaotic streaming universe where quantity is valued over quality. But what more should I have expected when these streaming platforms still can't get my personal viewing Algorithms right. Netflix thinks I want to watch Shooter with Mark Wahlberg? Really? That's what you've learned about me in 5 years?Nobody will not be talking about this movie in a month. It will be forgotten just like Apple's Tom Hanks sci-fi film, Finch.In defense of Netflix, Don't Look Up, Power of the Dog, and Extraction still give me hope for the future of streaming.....go rewatch one of those movies, you'll enjoy it more.

title: Best Netflix movie I've seen in a while
text: This cynical dad actually really enjoyed this movie despite mediocre reviews. The film was entertaining, fun, endearing and made a pretty good family night movie at our house.

title: Another Reynolds movie
text: I'd like to see Reynolds do a different character, his range is getting really tiresome plus, the kid is unbelievably annoying, I had to force myself to finish this movie. Mark Ruffalo and Jennifer Garner are awesome as always.

title: Very entertaining!
text: Surprised the rating on this isn't higher. It was funny, touching, and full of fun action scenes. It's a very entertaining watch. I just love Ryan Reynolds and Mark Ruffalo and all the actors in this movie were great. Definitely worth a watch.

title: garbage time travel plot, one trick pony cgi
text: Watch the trailer, that covers all the amazing things about this movie. Netflix is getting desperate. Ads on news website come with more cgi than this movie. Did all the writes gave into the big resignation, where are they?

title: Excellent movie!
text: People need to stop complaining about every little thing! Was a super fun movie with some tear jerker moments, great action, great comedy! People need to let go and just enjoy themselves. I actually even want to watch it again. Best part of the movie was the movie itself. So much fun. Can't wait to have my own kid so I can neglect them for science in the future. I also love dogs.

title: Bored to death
text: Who makes these movies? Ryan Renolds should move on from the cheesy dialogued quasi action movies. This movie has neither substance nor style.Sci-fi movies shouls also have something remotely related to science.

title: Brilliant film
text: Me and my husband loved this film from start to finish. Ryan is brilliantly funny in it. Great story line. I have nothing but great things to say about this film. A must watch.

title: Nothing like junk cinema these days
text: Project Adam is not a bad film, although I would understand that many would disagree with me. It is often said that the best way to define something is to say what it is, and if in this case I don't start that way it is simply because it is simpler and probably closer to a common point to say that it is not bad. Nor is it good. It is, as the title says, junk cinema. That which surely aspires to be nothing more than a moment of disconnection and entertainment. A healthy distraction that takes us away from the sometimes difficult and exhausting exercise of thinking.Project Adam is not a good movie. Its greatest virtue is to entertain, which is no small thing, and I say that honestly, but it relies so much on its strategy, on its forms, that it cannot be said that it always succeeds. It takes risks with characters, and with actors, that can become tiresome and tiresome. Also, with scenes that are a bit forced. Perhaps it relies too much on the names in its cast, but the feeling is that some are on autopilot. Viewed with the right disposition and good humor, it may deliver. However, it's not nearly as good a showcase of the almost always-maligned sci-fi filmmaking. Yes, I know I'm saying again what it's not, but be warned.

title: Family friendly bad writing
text: It's an easy film where you don't need to think. The film is just there to set up Ryan Reynolds one liners (love him btw). Overall it's a bit boring and would of been better to write this as a comedy given the comedic talent they had.

title: Everything Phenomenal but the score...
text:
This movie is probably one of the best of the great five Netflix movies so far, the tune for a great picture is ready but the only thing that it makes "Hollywood" movies great is the score! It's the only thing missing here unless besides being great, it could be memorable, which is the hardest part.I'm movie lover born in 1980, I've seen lots lots of movies in my whole live, and I can tell you that I'm very skeptical about Netflix making "Hollywood" amazing entertainment, so when I see a Netflix trailer I can tell by far how big, expensive, techs, and experienced crew hired for...Let me tell you, Netflix surprised me in 5 movies so far, one of them was almost lowcost but with a good well known leading actor.Here's some tips for success:
Good script! Even if it's around the "seen topic"
An experienced director selected according with the topic of the movie and ability.Well known leading actors! Resurrected count!Supporting actors make such a big difference every time ...
A score! Is mostly 50% of the movie...John Williams my all time choice but there's a few good other and new alternatives.Credible and good High-techs based on real science. Without exaggeration!The best photography director you can find.And the hardest part, always trying to contradict or supreme the viewer with the unexpected!And to be perfect, all the project workers really must really believe and love what they are doing, when it's made with love..."we can feel it" but never without a strong score.This movie gets an 8 because it deserves it and it's my vote of confidence to Netflix... I feel "you guys" are almost there.Thank you for reading.

title: Mediocre time travel movie
text: I can't ever say I hated a Ryan Reynolds movie because I love him. However, this one was incredibly mediocre for a time travel movie with a solid cast... I could have done without seeing it..can I have my time back?

title: A good balance of fun and sci-fi drama
text: Ryan Reynolds seems to be everywhere right now, and I can see why: he's good. He's also good at choosing parts that suit his talents. This movie is a nice combination of time travel sci-fi, drama and action, and all wrapped up in a fun and often funny ball. Just good entertainment.

title: Just Okay
text: It wasn't awful, but you've seen it all before. The kid is a good actor, and he's got a future in hopefully better material than this. You really can't take a Ryan Reynolds movie seriously, because he's the same wise-cracking tool in everything he does these days. I guess you stick with what pays the bills.The writing is instantly forgettable, with the exception of the banter between old/young Adam. That's got funny moments, and the kid delivers the cracks much like Reynolds, so you can see them being the same. The plot is totally outrageous and makes no sense. If you believe in even the most basic of movie time travel laws, you'll realize that had all these timelines actually been breached in this way that they totally screwed up history in three of them. But of course the movie ends without examining any of that fallout. Beyond ridiculous that the future he comes from would be the same.Watch it if you can't find anything better. There's enough to enjoy here without too much wishing you could get the time back.

title: Fun, interesting, and a little heartwarming
text: Such a fun movie! It's funny and has a happy ending. We all need both these days! I really don't get why this doesn't have a higher rating. Also, the kid who plays little Adam is a great little actor.

title: Why only 5/10 stars????
text: I loved it. It's going down in one of my all time favourites. I dont get the haters saying it's not realistic... It's SCI FI!.... by definition it requires you to suspend reality. Show me where Star Wars has ever been realistic! Nobody had ever suggested this represented reality at any point, so yeah, the haters will boo hoo, but they're probably better off with an Auschwitz docos if they cant handle a joke.Ryan never disappoints and Walker Scobell playing his younger self is a huge highlight. That kid has a HUGE future in acting if he wants it.I'm no big fan of action flicks, but to me this was amazing despite having a lot of action sequences. It is actually an incredible blend of genres. That takes a lot of skill to make, which I think the haters tend to miss.

title: Superb
text: What's not to like on this one.Damn I had so much fun watching this,, emotions are flying all directions.If you like stranger things, lost in space, StarWars etc etc its definitely for you. But that all doesn't feel ripped cause this movie has its own identity and the band the characters build up is one to remember.

title: It was better than I hoped...and I hoped it'd be really good
text: Clever premise. Snarky (and hot) Ryan. Cute, smart kid who's not too cute or too smart. JEN AND MARK! Decent, geeky action. Romance and humor. All this these elements I hoped for and we got. But I didn't expect the emotion or the depth - those put it over the top for me.

title: Enjoyable
text: Not perfect, but I really enjoyed it. Good amount of action and family dynamics. Time travel is an interesting subject matter, and this is one of the better movies about it.

title: An enjoyable mix between time travel action and comedy
text: In 2050, an apocaliptic future in which time travel exists, Adam Reed steals the time jet and escapes into the year 2022. There he meets his 12 year old self, and together they'll attempt to fix an injustice and beat the evil villainess Maya Sorian.Personally I've always loved Ryan Reynolds and his humor, and I enjoyed the similarities between him and Walker Scobell, who plays his 12 year old self. Old Adam attempts to mentor his younger self, and the scenes in which they address how he treats her mother and how that makes him feel in the future are really touching and heartwarming.Even though it attempts to be an action movie mixed with comedy, it isn't exactly "the avengers" with RDJ and the rest of the cast, so some of the action scenes and special effects look a little bit forced and unnecessary. There are also some holes in the overall plot, which leave the viewers with questions that might go unanswered.Some people expected a very deep meaningful movie. However, if you see any of the other Ryan Reynolds movies you will notice that none of them are meant to be that deep. They are made to just sit down, relax and have a laugh.

title: One part Back to the Future, one part Terminator equals fun ride
text: Adam is 12 and is grieving the recent death of his scientist father Lew - Mark Buffalo. He is fighting in school and lashing out at his lovely Mother - Jennifer Garner. But, oh golly, a downed pilot - Ryan Reynolds - lands near his garage. After initial dislike, Adam learns this man is from the Future and is Adam himself, the older version. It seems Big Adam has come back to prevent Lew's time travel discoveries from being controlled by an Evil woman, once a friend. Naturally, she - Catherine Keener- comes back also to stop Big Adam with her fighting Robots and high-tech weapons. So, little Adam teams up with his Big AND a long lost wife - Zoe Saldana - to outsmart the Bad bad lady. Who wins ? This very enjoyable films blends familiar elements, humor, great effects and a fantastic cast to please sci-fi loving families everywhere. As it's only on Netflix you may need to jump some hoops but it's worth it.

title: That's Interesting!
text:
Wow wow!!It's a well done movie
An Adventure through drama and light comedy and very good story
Perfect acting form Ryan as always
I recommend this to watch.

title: Excellent high concept fun.
text: I enjoyed this movie with a bowl of popcorn. They did a fine job with the plot. The acting is top-notch. There is a lot of star power in this movie. The script is great.

title: If your a fan of Ryan Renolds you'll love it!
text: Good story and really enjoyable movie!To take lightly and just have a good time and there you go!The little kid is so FUNNY! 😂Just watch it if you want a good time you'll thank me later!

title: It's a comedy, calm down
text: This is a comedy, with some "sci-fi" wrapped up in it. It's cute, it's funny, and Walker Scobell is an absolute treasure. Seriously, this kid's timing is perfect. He has a bright future.If you walked into this thinking you were going to witness sci-fi genius, you went to the wrong movie.People take things way too seriously. It's Ryan Reynolds. It's a comedy. It's not a documentary film on time travel.WHICH, BY THE WAY, ISN'T REAL, so stop worrying about the "science behind it". Jeesh. It's a movie, a work of fiction, calm down.

title: Netflix original became of age!
text: For me, this was the first Netflix original that met the standards of a Hollywood blockbuster. Great story, mature CGI and great cast with good chemistry. Reynolds did a very good job mixing his humor with a serious touch as well. And a special recommendation for the 'young Adam' Walker Scobell.

title: I had a hell of a good time
text: Did this movie reinvent the genre? Well, no. Was the story original? Absolutely not, it's basically Back to the Future II combined with the Bruce Willis Comedy The Kid. Did I have a great evening with this film? Definitely.The dream team from The Good Guy has done it again and when you enjoyed that film and like Ryan Reynolds, than you get exactly what you expected. No real surprises here, but luckily no disappointments either.The action is really good, the effects are a blast, the use of songs perfect, it has a lot of heart and is very funny. That's a lot to pull off and just add to that a time travel story that never gets too complicated and actually make sense. Which is nothing short of a miracle.Plus, the cast is a dream. Having 4 Marvel actors in one film is just great fun, even if Zoe Saldana and Jennifer Garner could have been featured a little more. But seeing Reynolds and Mark Ruffalo as a father-son-duo almost makes up for it. And seriously, the child actor they have chosen to play the young Reynolds is fantastic, often unexpectedly stealing the show.

title: Adam's Journey
text:
He had to travel to save his dear Wife but he found himself another person just twenty eight years ago, The action was 8/10
Comedy 9/10
I don't know what does the meta score want
It should give it higher score
Don't listen to them the movie is good and Ryan was the best in acting.

title: Fantastic. Enjoyable.
text: All the time travel rules are thrown out the window into total chaos in this family-friendly action film. It'sfun, enjoyable, and has a ton of heart. Anyone who hates on this film is a time nazi.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home - meets The Kid - meets Avengers: End Game - meets Star Wars
text:
OVERALL:Overall #TheAdamProject gives Spider-Man: No Way Home - meets Avengers: End Game - meets Star Wars - meets The Kid.I honestly enjoyed this film, and a lot of it had to do with the chemistry between not just Ryan and Walker, but from most of the interacting actors in Acts Two and Three. The film could definitely work on a tighter theme and story connection for me, but it wasn't like it was loose and sloppy. It was a pretty straightforward sci-fi premise.OTHER THOUGHTS:
Highlights: The interaction between present and future Adam, Zoe Saldana, the pretty solid CGI work, Walker Scobell in general (there's a promising future for him), the small but entertaining relationship with Christos, and the overall pacing of the film for engagement.Could've Been Better: More depth to the relationship between present Adam and his mother to fully understand Adam's flaws to connect to the theme more, Jennifer Garner felt like that random leaf tossed on a sadiddy upscale Michelin restaurant dish (and this is not to say that this film IS that dish...just focus on the random leaf on a plate LOL), and more to the motivations of Maya-her motivation felt so bland and like an easy cop-out in regards to character creation.

title: Considering Biden is likely to blunder us into WW3, perfect show.
text: Just kidding...well, not really. But yeah, its a family friendly show, and I would say anyone could enjoy. Not a bad story, and not bad acting. Lets hope we dont have to depend on time travel to keep us all from dying of radiation sickness after Biden gets us involved in fighting Russia over Ukraine's NATO membership.

title: Absolutely Loved This Movie!!
text: It's funny.. Its sad. Its a thriller.. Action.. The acting from the young Adam is fabulous!! I just loved it... A must see with all the terrible things happening.. Its a real feel good movie..

title: Yet another Master Peice by Ryan Reynolds
text: What can I say, The Adam Project touched perfectly on sentimental life values, crude humor, comedy witty punch lines and some serious rifle action by Zoe Saldana.I was particularly caught by the Father/Son roles replaying in past present and future contexts, that is quite a feat to ascertain and replay. I honestly wish I could do this movie personally, there is so much that slapped me dead in the face involving my personal situations that this movie just reached out and bear hugged me on a level I could not physically endure. This literally is a snapshot of me at that teen-aged rioting rebellious idiot I was, looking back at that life with the life I live now, I literally cannot fathom how I was like that.The action scenes with Zoe and her rifle, DROOL! Love me some Zoe Saldana when she is in the moment and sighted in.Reynold's, slaps us once again with the witty antics, the crude gut punch humor and the sentiment displayed of being able to go back and semi fix some of the mistakes he made as a kid.I absolutely loved the collaboration Easter Eggs.Not to many errors in this one either, Hollywood is getting good on the research and immersion.There was a few at the end, with technical stuff, but that's Hollywood it has to have SOME "WOW" factor to it.

title: A really lovely film
text: I have never reviewed a film before but this film made me decide to change that. I loved this film. The acting was wonderful. The effects were brilliant. The story was poignant. This was a really well made film and I am so glad I decided to take a chance on it.We need more films like this.

title: Well for having a good time
text: Almost all stories about time travel have their problems. This one also leaves a feeling of: I would have 1000 questions!But, and this distinguishes it from many others, it was damn entertaining!The film is enjoyable, doesn't take itself too seriously and the actors harmonize very well with each other.

title: Oh Yeah!!!
text: A fun ride from beginning to end. As time travel themes go, the story is more than respectable. Typical Ryan Reynolds schtick. The special fx are great with enough action to keep you engrossed.

title: Destined To Become Future Classic
text: The subject of time travel has always fascinated me. This film addresses it in an intelligent yet heartwarming manner. There is the right mix of drama, science fiction and even comedy, along with a number of dialogue lines which may be forever remembered. Plus it doesn't hurt that the film has an excellent music soundtrack. Kudos all around!

title: Really great movie!
text: I didn't give this movie much hope but wow, it was wonderfully written, funny, unique and thrilling all in one. I'd watch it again and 100% recommend.

title: All around great movie.
text: I'm not going to pick apart the whole time travel concept. I do not have a PhD in Physics.What I do have is a son, and we both thoroughly enjoyed watching it together. Visually stunning and and audio track that rocked the surround.Ryan Reynolds has been throwing out some great entertainment lately for the whole family, never a dull moment.

title: Misleading poster and movie art, but fun movie if you let it be.
text: You'll love it if you have no idea what you're going to see. But I feel that all the posters are very misleading and make people rate this movie in a contecst this movie shouldn't be viewed in.

title: The feel good movie I needed!
text: The feel good movie I needed it really made my day! The cast was really hearty in the way they acted which made the movie a really interesting feature.

title: Fun, funny, heartfelt time travel movie
text: Great cast, acting and chemistry between young Adam, Big Adam and Laura and the farther. It seems great thought has gone into what you would say and do if you meat your younger self. The cgi (I think of young Sorian) wasn't convincing and a little distracting. But overall a great watch, good banta and enjoyable family moments.

title: Fun movie
text: I'm not going to get into any scientific review. I went into this thinking.....I've got some time to kill. I'm not big on Ryan Reynolds but this was a very entertaining movie. I'll watch this movie again, probably more than two....three times. I enjoyed all the actors and I highly recommend this movie.

title: Re-inventing sci fi
text: There have been many movies about time travel, some good, some bad and some okay. This particular movie is a fun movie and very satisfactory to watch. Some sci fi buffs will tell you the science is bad, but how do they know? No one has done it yet! Enjoying this story is all that counts. There is also lots of action in it and more than enough tension to take you to your realms of your reality.

title: Entertaining sci-fi
text: I really enjoyed this one! And I'm not a fan of Ryan Reynolds' movies.Nice acting, emotional score, really good action sequences and special effects.For a Netflix flick it was really good, I would've watched it at the cinema too.

title: I love this movie
text: I loved this movie, it was so sad, I was crying at the end and when I Adam's future self looking at his younger self being mean to his mom I started crying and when he talked to his mom at the bar it was so sad. This movie was so nice and heartbreaking.

title: Kinda like Stars Effect on me
text: Love this film. Hits the heart of the time travel.. father son relationship with twists and turns and special effects that I love. The spooky airplane scenes and the tongue in cheek humor makes for a fun family film. Super fun!!!

title: My favorite movie of all times

title: Be the best version of yourself because those who do not remember the past are doomed to repeat it
text: The main characters in the movie are Adam Reed, young Adam Reed, Laura Shane, Ellie Reed, Louis Reed, and Maya Sorian; that's starring Ryan Reynolds, Mark Ruffalo, Jennifer Garner, Walker Scobell, Zoe Saldana, Catherine Keener, and Alex Mallari Jr.Giving a brief summary of the plot is the 'Adam Project' is a comedy, action, and sci-fi fueled with a feel-good adventure about a fighter pilot who travels back in time and teams up with his 12-year-old self.The possible theme is be the best version of yourself, even if you have to make peace with your past to make a better future for everyone.The audience who would like this movie are 11-year-olds and up.In my opinion of the movie, the introduction captured my imagination and naturally lead into the rest of the movie. The dialogue was funny in parts and meaningfully written. The acting was natural and vibrant. The soundtrack and the special FX are creative and ethereal. I loved this movie because it was amusing, inspiring, and original. Netflix has made another good movie amongst the best sci-fi movies I ever seen.Overall I would recommend the movie because what I've learned from it was to "Don't despise these small beginnings, for the Lord lord rejoices to see the work begin" (Zechariah 4:10). Especially, with yourself because those who do not remember the past are condemned to repeat it, but changing the world must first start with the man in the mirror.

title: Action, comedy, tears, fun
text: Everything you would expect from Reynolds, Ruffalo and Garner. The younger Reynolds did an absolutely incredible acting job as well. My husband and I loved this movie!!! Worth the watch! If you struggle with knowing your Dad loved you, watch!!! So so good!!

title: Recommended by IMDB and ...
text: It is a fun watch. I would not have picked it out for myself, but enjoyed it nonetheless.Decided to ignore the timey-wimey plot holes at the outset because none of it makes any sense at all. Also seeing Jennifer Garner as a housewife is disconcerting. Young Adam (Walker Scobell) acted well throughout, was impressed with him. Overall a pleasant use of time.

title: Very Good...
text: Great concept, well executed. The two Adams bounce off each other brilliantly. Really good acting from both of them.. the Time Travel is dealt with excellently..then when they meet Dad it gets better. The writing is excellent and hits you when you're not looking. The last few scenes..well I'll leave that up to you...No Crying!! Very good family movie.

title: Wonderful. A classic
text: I don't understand why this film got any bad reviews. It's well-acted, well-written, the dialogue sings and some of it is laugh out loud funny. It's also moving, and here and there, oddly beautiful, and I never thought I'd say that about a sci-fi film after Blade Runner. The performances are faultless, and young Adam is an actor to watch. Not all Ryan Reynolds films work, but this one does. Terrific stuff.

title: Over some peoples head?
text: Some of the reviews stating about the setting, or the dialogue have clearly misunderstood what the film is about. It's a nostalgic masterpiece that pulls on the great 80's films in a modern funny but emotional way. Great film that made me laugh, get sad and smile throughout the entire thing. Brilliant.

title: Better than The Batman
text: Saw the new 3 hr long Batman movie last week, this movie was so much better! Very entertaining. Mindless fun adventure, great action, great acting. I have not enjoyed this good of a movie in a long time, I would gladly pay to see it in the theater.

title: Funny, sad...great movie!!
text: Really enjoyed this movie. There's sci-if, comedy, drama and everything in between. Ryan Reynolds is great as is the kid who plays a younger Adam. There's great chemistry between the two. Very meaningful and thought provoking movie. Watched it with my wife and 10 year old son and everyone loved it! I gave it 10 stars!!

title: Do keep in mind... it's a family movie
text: This is something that the whole family can watch. Therefore, if as an adult, you watched it on your own, you may have some expectations not to be fulfilled.But as a family movie - the perfect thing to watch all together.

title: Ryan is good, kid is good story is fun
text: But then of course we have to go all woke on the interracial relationships that are obligatory in all new productions. I seriously don't have a problem if they were one out of every four or five, but eight out of ten is a bit much. I understand the leftist social engineering aspect, but give us a break.

title: Missed the mark
text: Great cast. Great performances. BUT the flaws in the premise completely dampened any enjoyment of the movie. There are so many time travel movies, the canon is pretty worn out, and you can't make illogical leaps without it pulling the fabric of the movie apart. I wanted to like this movie, I like the cast in most everything else they do, but this movie needed better writing, better direction and a respect for its genre. I give this film a 6 (fair) out of 10. {Time Travel Adventure}

title: One of the best movies I have seen in a while
text: I don't know what people expect nowadays. I personally think this was one of the best all around movies I have seen in a while. The story was good it had great pacing, Walker was fantastic for his first ever acting role. And his and Ryan Reynolds chemistry was fantastic. People need to stop critiqueing movies over the stupidest stuff sometimes and enjoy it for what it is.

title: Fun, and surprisingly touching at times
text: I will be short on this one, I really enjoyed the movie. The actors are all so charismatic (I really liked. Scobell's performance, and I'm excited to see him as the new Percy Jackson!), the story it's a fun sci-fi adventure, but at the same time deals a lot with family trauma, and has some emotional scenes, mostly when characters are able to some what correct errors of the past, or have a second shot with a loved one.Overall tho, yes, one could nitpick the plot to death mostly likely, it's hard to do a plot holesses time travel movie, but I respect that the movie doesn't even try to explain certain paradox that the time travel element would have created, so I wont go into those details, I respect if you think that makes the movie worst, but at the end of the day I had fun, and I was okay with ignoring some stuff.The CGI to de-age the main villain is... rough tho, I mean, Jesus, that took me out of the movie every time. I rather go the route of taking a younger actress and having make up on her in the future scenes, and herself as the past version, than doing this...Still, I really enjoyed the movie, the action scenes are great, Ryan Reynolds is, as always, really funny (and we even got a Deadpool reference I guess? "Superhero landing", which was cool), the movie has a good pace that doesn't make you look away at any point, and a good satisfying conclusion. Really really solid.

title: Best film of 2022
text: I've never left a review on any movie but trust me, the cast, the writing, the special effects are just so awesome.Ignore the geeks leaving bad reviews because of time travel, the movie is meant to be entertaining and not to explain time travel.So sit back, grab a popcorn and enjoy.

title: Enjoyable Sci-fi Thriller
text:
The Adam Project Is a Enjoyable Sci-fi Thriller.It has Very Good Visuals ,
Good Action Scenes .Great Performance.Story Plot could have done More Interesting and Intriguing.Available In Netflix.

title: Thought it was fun and entertaining
text: Will not win an Oscar, but just family fun. Acting is solid and good cast. Special effects were also decent for a netflix movie, so I have no regrets watching it.

title: One of the best Time travel and sci-fi movie
text: It is best movie of both Scincefiction and Time travel combo,Movie length is some small but it has a great emotion. It is also available in Telugu,Hindi,english etc Languages.

title: Surprisingly good
text: Given the amount of twaddle that has been released over the last couple of years, I found this surprisingly good. Easy to follow but enough going on to keep the interest and given that I don't like films revolving around child actors, this was a shocker for me to have enjoyed. Some belly laughs in the early part. Good film.

title: Good
text: Great concept and production. Although it would have been nicer to see more on the interaction of time traveling on the Adam character.Ryan Reynolds is playing the same guy in all the movies but somehow cracks it. Good for him. Similar like Liam Nelson. Same guy. Different movies. It still works.

title: Better than that 6.7 suggests...
text: I almost didn't watch this because people were so hard on it but I sure am glad that I did. Time travel is my fav genre but this was so much more, I truly enjoyed it.

title: An adventurous time travel movie
text: Time travel movies are my favourite kind of movies. Adam project is a very good movie. Of course it has some bad senario moments but i don't mind it very much. The ending is very emotional and very touching. I totally suggest it.

title: Really funny and entertaining- loved it!
text: A cross between back to the future and flight of the navigator and just very funny slick Ryan Reynolds humour. Very dry and witty. Fantastic cast, good story and good graphics. Very enjoyable evening.

title: Surprisingly fun
text: Been a big fan of Ryan Reynolds since his days in Two Guys, a Girl, and a Pizza Place. And while he seems to have been typecast into a certain kind of role for most of the roles he does (with a few notable exceptions that I thought were well done), he does such a GOOD job with that smart mouth kind of character.This was an enjoyable ride right from the beginning. Yes, there are a lot of issues with any time travel movie. And if you're a person who is in it for the science, then don't watch this movie. But if you're in it for the fun, then this is worth the time.Some typical tropes here, but again, done nicely. And some very good banter, some lines I have to make a note of since they were so good that I want to start using them myself.Effects were nicely done as well. There was enough character development to give a little depth without bogging down the movie or going so far you snooze.There wasn't really a moment that I felt I was losing interest. It kept me entertained from the start to the end.

title: Another gem feom Ryan Reynnolds
text:
Ryan Reynolds has yet again entertained me with "The Adam Project" while squeezing out a few tears at the same time.(damn you)
The kid who plays the younger Ryan Reynolds was perfectThere will be many who will argue the storyline and let them
I still had a great time with this movie
great soundtrack and amazing special effects you would expect in the theatresAnd nice to see Jennifer Garner againThank you Ryan Reynolds for another great time.

title: Walker Scoobel is an amazing actor
text: This was recommended by Netflix so I went ahead and popped it in. After an hour or so, I can say that I have no regrets only tears in my eyes. This kind of story is lone overdue. In a world of superheroes na overrated bitches comes a family movie that casually reminds you of your golden childhood. Ahh the bliss.

title: yes.
text: My all time fav movie - the people in the reviews here obviously can't notice real talent, amazing storyline and cinematography when it is right there in front of there eyes. The producers, writers and directors obviously sat down and said exactly this "Lets make a movie that is sci-fi but also incorporates love, family, tears, laughter, comedy and lets compile all of the best actors along with the funniest kid we can get and make a movie - oh and lets also make the special affects to die for"Like the people that write about the 'mediocrity' f this film make me sad. How about lets just enjoy a good movie!

title: SO GOOD!!
text: I was up extremely too late watching this, but it was totally worth it. I wanted to watch The Adam Project because I love Percy Jackson(who is Walker Scobell) and didn't know what to expect. But in the end, I ended up crying(in a good way) such a good movie, phenomenal acting, and it was hilarious. I'm so happy I found this movie, it is now my comfort movie, and I love it. As well as that, the plot was so interesting, and made me want to keep watching. One disclaimer, which I feel is obvious, although some people might not get it. The movie is rated pg-13 and has a few inappropriate moments, but nothing really occurs, besides kissing. All in all, one of my favorite movies ever.

title: Enjoyable
text: This is a very enjoyable time travel film without much complications in the plot.It's more like a family movie than a sci-fi movie go and watch it if you have freetime you will enjoy it.🙂

title: Amazing
text: The movie is filled with comedy and cinematography of this movie was executed wisely , VFX of the movie was kind of unique atleast according to me . This movie perfectly deals with emotions and family drama .The climax can be better.

title: quite a good movie
text: The film was totally predictable, but i love sound and special effects. Actors did pretty good job with the script. Funny and charming.I personally recommend this film to all fans of science fiction.

title: Best script ever in terms of Comedic timing.
text: Simply the most funny movie Ryan ever made.The comedic timing in this movie is key.The plot is kind of cheap when it comes to time travel and yet the CGI helps alot to add value, while its still a Comedy really.All in all a great family comedy movie.

title: I love this movie!!!
text: We've watched it multiple times and I'm still not tired of it. The kid playing young Adam (Walker Scobell) is going to go far. With Ryan Reynolds, Mark Ruffalo and Zoe Saldana it already has some great acting credibility.Makes me wish that time travel is real. Wouldn't we all like to go back in time to fix that one little thing that caused us pain? It's a fantasy that we all dream about. That or hitting the lottery since we can memorize the numbers. 😁Not sure of all the hate thrown at this film in some of the reviews but I guess the old adage "haters gotta hate" rings true. Honestly, go pop some popcorn and sit back and enjoy the show!

title: It was fun!
text: If you want to be picky, you'll find things to pick at. But this movie is family fair and as much for the kiddies as the grownups, so it's not a deep meaningful cinematic experience. But it is fun and fast paced and has a lot of smart alecky humor and really cool fight scenes.

title: Enjoyed every minute!!
text: Can't believe some of the ratings!! Did they watch the same movie? Super cute and funny with a touch of emotion and life lessons. Really enjoyed this movie and it's not even a genre I would normally select.

title: I dislike movies about time travel & hate annoying little brats, however.......
text: I dislike movies about time travel & HATE annoying little brats, however....... I am very pleased that this movie totally surprized me & found it hugely enjoyable.Snappy, quick & witty dialogue. Great casting & acting (even the annoying brat fits in perfectly)PS: good OST included.I dislike movies about time travel & HATE annoying little brats, however.......
