title: Loved it all the wanna be movie critics take the broomstick outta your backside
text: First off this is not a documentary so sadly many are taking this way to seriously. This is a tongue in cheek semi-comedy drama with a good story really. And its fun it kinda is.If you are over ultra serious anal about your movies this is not for you. But if you like tongue in cheek humor with a touch if ass kicking, save the day kinda movie that tugs at your heart strings with its feel good moments. Then this is the movie for youI liked it and I am the kind of guy who will watch a movie over and over for years I can even recite Animal House word for word.I can see myself watching this movie time to time.

title: Emotional moments, but also funny! Great Movie overall
text: This movie started off first with a great casting Everybody was amazing and it made for great moments all throughout the whole movie. I really enjoyed the movie, there was incredible fight scenes that I was not expecting going into a sc-if movie. One was my favorite moments was the 13 going on 30 reunion between Jennifer Garner and Mark Ruffalo, that was such a sweet moment. Overall great story and a very touching movie it was really enjoyable, would definitely watch again for sure! Ryan Reynolds was funny and very handsome self in this movie I loved watching him in this kind of role, the part was perfect for him!

title: One of the best movies!
text:
First i have to say my Englisch is really Bad
The Adam Project is one of the best Movies ive ever watched. It has nice sceens and also an dramatic story. The charackters are really nice made and the story is really nice. I love this movie!!!

title: Not a fancy movie like marvel but it is a good movie
text: This film Adam Project is not going to win any Oscars, but it is a good scientific movie about time travel. I cry a little and laugh a little. This movie have a lot of fun and sadness. It reminds me about science fiction movie in the eighties. It has enough action such as fly in the wood, futuristic weapons. The movie was clearly inspired by "jedi". There is some mid swearing but nothing too offensive and any age can enjoy the movie. In the end, I clearly recommend it to fans ....... Do not expected a fancy movie like marvel but it is a good movie.

title: I really enjoyed this movie
text: It was funny, exciting, and has a cool concept. More of a preteen kind of movie, though. Ryan Reynolds was great as older Adam. I thought it was awesome because we all want to go back in time just to see someone we loss, at least I do! It's heartwarming and a fun watch!

title: Wild Ryan
text: Great beautiful movie yeah no Spoilers. What to say crazy sci-fi best effects. He is doing well and perfect vfx. The actress was fighting great along with him.

title: Not bad for an entertainer
text: Pretty good for an entertainer piece... For a time where's everyone's a film maker with zero knowledge of film making this one's a piece of cake.. loved the way little Adam was portrayed.

title: One of the better family friendly in awhile
text: I'm not sure why so many people were critical of this movie. I'm 32, and this was a very nice time passer. I had no issues with the visuals, didn't notice the timing errors, it simply was engaging enough to have me not bored. I never went to turn it off and the fact I didn't pick up my phone once to scroll other platforms says to me that it was well worth the watch. Its a heart warming little film with great actors. Well worth the watch if you're looking for something this weekend!

title: Just an outliner...
text: AM not at all a review guy,but i just couldn't step back from coming here!.Ryan did his job perfect as usual. The chemistry between big adam and jr adam was a standout. No one could have played this role better than MARK RUFFALO,though having a smaller screen space he just took my breath off! Not to defy the fact I just teared up through the climax i had it personally relatable in some ways. He did his father portion with utmost care. To be more precise i had already watched 30 mins of the movie as soon as it got premiered but i lacked interest of seeing the rest of the film. Today i gathered myself to watch this and I pretty sure am regretting for skipping this movie for days. Sorry Again!

title: A lot of fun and heart
text: First off, I have NO idea how they found someone that could convincingly look like Ryan at a young age (who could also act) but they did a good job.It's a good enough flick (with EXCELLENT song choices), I could watch it again with the family, in the not too distant future. And I think ANY movie that reminds us to cherish people while we have them is a Very. Good. Thing.I didn't see a lot of weird plot errors, or inconsistencies (which is saying a lot for a time travel film!) and excellent performances were given by all, though I do wish we'd have seen Jennifer Garner more. Her presence in front of the camera has been missed.There were not a TON of surprises or twists, but enough to keep you guessing, without also not feeling like the director is trying to pull of "gotcha!" moments on you.It's a popcorn movie - enjoy it!

title: Same old but with a nice twist
text: While Ryan Reynolds place his normal role, what is most impressive is the actor playing the younger Adam, does such an amazing job at being a young Ryan Reynolds.

title: Fun,sweet, action packed
text: I thought this was a great movie. Very entertaining all around. Comedy, love, action, emotional, nice story. Good music. I throughly enjoyed it. I recommend it. It's just a fun movie.

title: Time travel Mission
text: Brilliant 👏🏻 Movie. Time travel is the concept of movement between certain points in time, analogous to movement between different points in space by an object or a person, typically with the use of a hypothetical device known as a time machine.I really enjoyed watching the movie. The cinematography / special effects , visual effects & action every thing is on point.This film is full of emotions,fun, action , adventure and basically it's a family story with a great story line. Each and every character is brilliantly portrayed by actors.I also find resemblence between Ryan Reynolds and Walker Scobell.Hats off 🙌🏻 to all the actors Ryan Reynolds, Walker Scobell, Jennifer Garner, Mark Ruffalo and Zoe Saldaña etc.

title: Great Fun
text: Ryan Reynolds type of acting needs the right co-stars to play off of and this kid was perfect for that part, the casting was job well done, family friendly and rewatchable, the plot was good but it didn't matter, the cast seemed to like each other and that made it work, highly recommended.

title: Better than expected
text: Love this movie Ryan Reynolds is as likeable as ever and the chemistry between him and the younger lead is great. The action and special effects were great and the star studded supporting cast was exceptional. Go to Netflix and watch it you won't be disappointed.

title: Not bad
text: Not a bad movie, very 80's style which was my era of growing up into my teenage years. Definitely a family kind of movie. I think all ages will enjoy this movie. As others have said here the first half of the movie was really good then when the dad makes his entrance it kind a gets boring but then i'm not a fan of Mark Ruffolo as he's a bit wooden.Worth a watch and i'll say no more.

title: Great time travel movie.
text: Our main character chases love across 3 different time periods, only to find out the whole thing was a set up job. So he teams up with himself, and his dead dad to undo what his dad had initiated in the first place.As far as time travel movies go, it's no primer, but it's continuity is right up there with Bill and Ted's Excellent adventure. And the action sequences plus a young and old version of Adam Reed, (played by deadpool,) brings the most sarcastic and witty exchanges imaginable. The banter is fun. The time travel is spot on. And the ending is not the ending we want, its the ending we need right now.Great job everyone!

title: Oh this is my sort of donkeybollox! Totally, loved it!
text: It's got everything I loved about, "Back to the future" - pop physics, time-travel, growing up, high school ptsd, going back, family, love, hope, warmth, laughs, action, adventure, great dialogue, but also great fights, big explosions & cool jets & other futuristic tech goodies. I need to lie down...

title: Has it all, comedy drama and action.
text: Loved this movie, is sensitive yet action packed and the plot is not bad. Don't really get the hater reviews, if you don't like Reynolds, I get it but don't hate on a well made movie like this one. Just watch it and decide for yourself.

title: Outstanding SciFi film
text: Going in you know it is a futuristic time travel movie...it's on the trailer!! It is super fun and emotional. Definitely a lesson for young kids and adults as well. Great special effects, great choreography and big sets in what it looks to be the Canadian great outdoors. Set all preconceptions aside, it is obvious that it doesn't have an Oscar winning story line but that does not take away the fact that this movie was well thought out. A couple of nods to other movies related to this one or the actors but well written in there.Have fun!!!

title: Loved it
text: I just love it,,, it was enjoyable film.And... Zoe Saldana Her role in the movie was small, but I think that day by day she proves that she is a very good actress and she has great reactions.

title: perfect effects
text: One of the most beautiful films according to me in terms of effects. The film had a lot of effects, but I liked it very much. The acting was beautiful and the actors played their roles beautifully, especially the actor Walker. I was surprised by his acting. He was so beautiful and he played his role wonderfully, but the film was a shock to me. I did not expect much from the film, but it was The film is creative in terms of effects, and mastered it beautifully. Some may think that the movie exaggerated the use of effects, but from the point of view of this movie, if it did not have the effects, the movie would have been a little bad, and this movie was for me one of the best effects that I have seen.

title: Fun Ride For All Ages!
text: My daughter, her boyfriend, my eldest daughter and myself decided to watch The Adam Project last night and we all loved it! Great sci-fi time travel story with a lot of heart and humor. Excellent cast including: Jennifer Garner, Zoe Saldana, Mark Ruffalo and of course Ryan Reynolds' usual charm and hilarious delivery. The young actor portraying 12 year old Adam; (Reynolds) Walker Scobell went toe to toe with seasoned actor Ryan Reynolds and held his own quite impressively. A fast paced fun ride!

title: Back to the Future meets Star Wars
text: The Adam project is your basic Time travel movie but at the same time it's a really fun time nonetheless. Adam and his Past self serve a really fun duo across the movie and their Father being pulled into the mix played by Mark Ruffalo makes it even better and takes the stakes to a galactic level that feels more grand and is a fun Movie for the family to enjoy for Movie Night.

title: Loved it!!
text: I'm not sure how many 64 year old, female, sci-fi/time travel loving people you have on here, but hey, this is me :-).This was one of the best I've seen, even over looking the minor flaws people are tending to find with this movie. (Garner's multi-decade transformation, urine soaked/not soaked pants, etc..) I found this movie to be one of the best I've seen in a long time, which is awesome!! I was beginning to think I would have to continue to search movies that were produced 30-40 years ago to find those that weren't filled with constant vulgarities and sexual scenes, or inferences, to add expected shock value to get people to watch! What a breath of fresh air!I often decide about how much I like a movie by whether I would buy it to watch whenever I want. This one I would definitely purchase, when it's no longer on Netflix.Thanks for giving me hope that there may still be some good/great movies being produced! :-)

title: Great fun! Make the popcorn & take a seat
text: Ryan Reynolds' sarcasm at its best! This movie is a great mix of comedy, sci fi, retroactive family love & chaos. Don't complicate it. Just have fun. ;)

title: Not the best story but really fun
text: This was a medium sci-fi story but nicely directed and well produced. The cast is great and they did all worth. The effects are also great and the scenery is beautiful.

title: Fun Family Fare
text: Imagine yourself as an eleven or twelve year old boy and you're chosen to be in a film with the actor who played one of your super heroes (Deadpool), in a SciFy time travel movie filled with action and gimmicks. How cool is that? WHAT A RIDE! Walker Scobell really pulled it off. The kid definitely has a future in the business.The movie itself is a lot of fun with terrific action and no gratuitous violence. It was well acted and well timed by all of the principals. The part of the older Adam could not have been done by anyone else but Ryan Reynolds. His 'snarky' delivery is spot on.Long story short, very enjoyable and a great 'escape' film. Highly recommended family fare.

title: really enjoyble movie
text: Found this movie quite good, had no expectation, but still was a quite a surprise. I find child actors annoying most of the time ,but that kid was really good in the role. Reynolds was as good as ever. Mark was fun too.All in all, highly recommend for some evening fun for whole family.

title: I Loved This Movie
text: I like Ryan Reynolds' acting, as well as Jennifer Garner and Mark Ruffalo (who were in "13 Going On 30" together - another awesome movie). I think the movie was well done....action, drama and a little romance. This one will definitely be on my "Watch Again List". As for the bad reviews.... I'm guessing these are the same people that gave good reviews to stuff like "Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure", "Dumb And Dumber" and "Me, Myself & Irene"....those "stupid" comedy movies!

title: Fun movie! Great story, too much action for me
text: Sometimes it is just too much. Love the planes though. So glad we can fast forward unnecessary beating people up, despite the cool effects.So will no mess up rating will raise it. Good acting, great cast and time travel subject matter.Ryan Reynolds always great. Funny.

title: Simply wonderful...
text: Simply wonderful, time travel, past, future, multiverse and the like I'm super interested, if you have cute kids, and a hint of black humor lover... All so perfect and intense that you can't help but surrender and fall in love...

title: A must-have on your watch list!
text: I have never been disappointed with Ryan Reynolds... even Green Lantern was fun... but hat definitely deserved the 3rd wall. This film was funny and enjoyable, the kid in it was quite frankly a mini-Ryan. Spot on. I would definitely recommend as a light action family film. Will be watching this again!

title: perfectly uplifting
text: I absolutely loved this movie. Reynolds always surprises me with this perfectly annoying humor/entertainment - i think this might be his best. Touching, but not too soft, just the right amount. Although i did cry at the end lol. Watch it!

title: Fun for the Whole Family
text: A rollicking romp reminiscent of a time when films were more charming and fun than dark and hopeless.I loved the dichotomy of dual selves of the two Adams. When adult Adam travels back in time and meets his twelve-year-old self, they join forces to defeat an evil villainess intent on world-wide control. This provides plenty of opportunities for hilarious exchanges. But this film also had poignant moments as both Adams try to come to term with the loss of their father. Their journey together incorporates great themes such as forgiveness, acceptance, love, and being kind to ones self. Good message for kids!The acting was top notch and the special effects state of the art. A real feel good flick.

title: Great quirky sci fi movie
text: Guardians of the galaxy meets Back to the future!! Ryan Reynolds does it again! So entertaining!!! Fun for kids and adults!! We need more family, adventure movies like this!!

title: One of the better Netflix original films
text: Netflix tends to invest in "original" movies, putting tons of money behind big name star power and terrible scrips. Most of the films are borderline terrible. The Adam Project, however, is well scripted, well acted, and has excellent special effects. I didn't feel like I had wasted my time watching it. In fact, I really enjoyed it and would recommend it to others.
