title: I really enjoyed this movie!
text: Fun time travel movie with a twist. Ryan Reynolds is great! Also a few emotional moments that hit home. Overall, a really good flick. The scenery is wonderful. Definitely the Great Northwest. Lot of action with a good overall story. Highly recommend for any audience!

title: Good flick
text: Well written and well executed. Fun watch with a really good cast. Ryan Reynolds doing what Ryan Reynolds does and the kids that plays young Adam does a fantastic job of playing a younger version of Ryan Reynolds.... did I mention Ryan Reynolds was in this? Well if I didn't Ryan Reynolds is in this. The multiple layers of love story between the difference characters was very well done and hits you in the feels a time or two.

title: 2ND FAVOURITE FILM OF 2022
text: This movie honestly caught me from the start with its great cast lineup. It had a lot of heart and really made me as a viewer have some heart felt moments with some okay action scenes. But I still think it's a great original idea where it counts.

title: Very entertaining
text: If you're looking for a funny, time travel, sci-fi, action flick with all the quirky goodness that is Ryan Reynolds and a little boy that coulda truly have been Ryan Reynolds as a child but without all the wokeness we have all become accustomed to then this is the movie for you... please enjoy.

title: Solid and fun syfy movie
text: Great and fun story action packt good jokes and good acting a great movie for the whole family, a little short but otherwise ok.Also good CGI , Renolds gives a solid performance.

title: Good Movie
text: If you expect the uber prime Oscar Winning film of the year, it is not (whatever that means btw). But is pretty enjoyable, the CGI is good and it has many very good dialogs.The kid is amazing, its actually everything you will think of a 12 yr old Ryan Reynolds, RY and Zoe do great. Rufallo and Jen just OK, the villain is a joke and by far the worst char dev in the filmFights are good, with the typical 10 high tech elite soldiers vs 1 injured hero winning which no ones believes would happen, but ok, its funGet your popcorn and have a good time with a hero landing ;)

title: There is no time travel
text: Biting the hand that feeds you never tasted so good. The Adam Project is a nod to Star Wars and Marvel and maybe even a soupcon of DC. This is a feel-good film for families and anyone who likes a good story. The cast is great and Ryan Reynolds (Big Adam), Walker Scobell (Young Adam), and Mark Ruffalo (Louis Reed) turn in performances that seem to be riffs rather than scripted performances.The plots nothing totally new. Reynolds comes back in time to correct a problem in his future, makes an error and accidently meets his younger self, and they need to team up to solve the problem, and some hilarity ensues amongst all the mayhem.Special effects are great but that's the norm today as film has long moved past Fantastic Voyage where Raquel Welch was the special effect. Don't get riled, that was 1966.Ignore the poor reviews and the nitpickers. Time travel does not exist, as far as I know, and all we have are a plethora of make-believe rules that have to be followed in the make-believe story we are watching. Really? Just sit back, have some popcorn nearby, and watch and enjoy the fun ride.

title: Magical pairing
text: Dr Dre and Eminem, deniro and Pacino, will Ferrell Adam McKay. When these pairings work together magic happens and I think that Reynolds and Shawn Levy are about to join the list of magical pairings. Great movie watchable again and again plus Walter Scobel is a revelation in this too.

title: Refreshing Escape
text: I found this movie to have a nice and refreshing take on this idea. Both Adams are great together. Has everything you need for a great escape after dinner or relaxing in the evening. Great soundtrack. They hit the song at just the right time.

title: I will probably rate it "Meh"
text: I will probably rate it "Meh" when I watch this action sci-fi movie again in 2050 but my 2022 review is: so cute and so Reynolds! (Don't listen to the de-aging detractors: the rendering is very believable - much more than blond brown-contact-lenses-eyed completely-different-shape-of-nose Young Adam)

title: Loved it
text: Great film. I probably wouldn't said the concept was great it was a general sci-fi concept but the journey the film took and with the actors used was amazing!Really is a great film and I would suggest watching it!

title: A Beautiful Sci-fi and Family Film!
text: The Adam Project is a great film, I have seen allot of critics saying "is just Ryan Reynolds playing Deadpool" when I didn't see that at all. I saw a serious character with humor, Deadpool can't be serious about a thing. The kid playing Adam, Walker Scobell, did an amazing performance, you feel Mark Ruffalo's performance as a scientist as well. The story is so beautiful and it should definitely be on the list of Fathers Day and Mothers Day.

title: Enjoyable and funny
text: I enjoyed this film. The script was great with some real funny moments and dialogue. Ryan Reynolds entertains once again with witty and funny acting. Some scenery seems a bit "fake" but over all the plot and story is solid. Some great action sequences along the way and Walker Scobell I think was fantastic in his role. A very enjoyable movie.

title: Great fun for everyone lots of action
text: Great time travel fun with lots of character emotions and great cast and effects. Very evil villains and excellent scenery all around. Ships are awesome designs and so are the unique weapons, hints of Star Wars return of jedi (forest chase) as well as a form of light saber. Some profanity and quite a bit of humorous parts and fun stuff throughout. Nice to see "hulk" in a different role, every time you see him you hope he doesn't get angry! Nice to see Zamora from guardians also. Lol. Fun for whole family as long as you don't mind a few cuss words. No woke stuff or nudity whatsoever which is nice, movie is focused on the plot and it's outcome without a lot of rabbit trails. Don't listen to the bad reviews, just enjoy a great movie and have some fun😊

title: I was touched.
text: I watched this movie to get entertained.I admit that, Ryan, annoying at times, is a good actor.But, oh boy, I was moved by this one.The Adam Project is a powerful family drama for teens and parents.The character portrayals of the actors are very convincing.I hate to say this but I relate to the old Adam.Unlike in the movie, I lost my Mama when I was ten years old.I got issues with my Dad; and I somehow see myself in Adam.My Dad was an absentee father.And I developed hatred towards him.This movie got me teary-eyed in those confrontation scenes.Generally, this movie does what it aims for.It's a movie for all ages.I highly recommend this flick.

title: Pure entertainment
text: While this family movie probably won't win any awards, it's very entertaining. At the foreground it has time travel, while in the background there's a steady flow of love: that of a father for his son, and vice-versa, love of a mother, and love for a spouse. Time travel is not a new concept, but this movie makes it great fun. For the past decade, Ryan Reynolds has been honing his own style, which is a blend of quirky humor and superhero athleticism, and I fell he's now at the top of his game. The part of middle-age Adam in this movie must have been written specifically for him, as it suits him perfectly.The rest of the cast is fine too. It goes without saying that Mark Ruffalo is an excellent actor, and the kid is alright. IMO the best component of this movie is the dialogue though, which is very well written, and several times it even brought tears in my eyes. Great movie for the whole family!

title: Enjoyed
text: If you're a male who was lucky enough to have had a great father, who passed way too soon, you will enjoy this movie. Father son movie. Field of Dreams vibes but not nearly as good as Field of Dreams.If you don't know what that's like, then you'll probably vote the same way as the people who don't know what that's like.

title: Realistic time travel
text: Great movie. They work out the science. Bad choice on music though. It's like they were rocking sound, and suddenly, the last 10% of the movie's soundtrack was instantly 30 years out of date.

title: To time travel or not
text: It's 2050 and 40-year-old Adam Reed (Ryan Reynolds) steals a time machine to try to save his wife Laura (Zoe Saldaña) in 2018. Pursued by soldiers of Maya Sorian (Catherine Keener), the owner of the time machines, he gets shot and lands in 2022 instead. He meets his bullied 12-year-old self (Walker Scobell) who eventually realizes the injured pilot is his future self.Due to the programming of the time machine that disallows operation while the DNA-programmed-pilot, i.e., him, is injured, he has to bring 12-year-old Adam along. When they both go back to 2018, they meet Laura who got stranded to escape Sorian's assassination attempt when Laura found out the future Sorian had been advising her past self to gain more wealth. They also meet their dad, Louis Reed (Mark Ruffalo), who died in 2021 and who realizes the time machine was based on the accelerator algorithm he developed for The Adam Project with his employer Maya Sorian. The three try to get rid of the algorithm. It's everybody's guess who triumphs in the struggle between them and Maya Sorian and her army.This is highly entertaining as well as touching. Adam's psychological scars caused by Louis Reed's death are healed in the course of their adventure. But the message that lingers the most is the realization that time travel would mess up the world and should never be attempted.

title: Was better than I thought!
text: I loved the plot. The acting was great. The movie score was great. Overall, funny and actiony, and the graphics 10000%. I would totally watch it again.

title: Surprisingly good movie
text: Usually I do not expect much from Netflix movies, seeing as they are normally 6/10 (at best) flicks that are only worth one watch. The Adams Project though is definitely more on the high quality end of Netflix projects with better than usual acting, average story, and pretty decent acting and character moments. The movie is still fresh, so can not say if it is memorable or not, but I can definitely see myself watching this again down the road and recommending it to some friends. Definitely give it a chance, because you will know in the first 5 minutes if you will like the movie or not seeing it starts off pretty fast.

title: Good movie but no serious SciFi
text: Unfortunately, this film doesn't offer any science fiction that should be taken seriously, but it still entertains with some touching scenes and comedy elements and is also somewhat exciting, but only if you get involved with it. For that you have to agree that the film is probably more of an (action) comedy with slight sci-fi elements than a sci-fi film with comedy elements, because the film doesn't feel real, which I think is because you can a bit exaggerated with the comedy in science fiction films lately (e.g. Also with Eternals). This is particularly noticeable in certain scenes where I think comedy doesn't really fit. E.g. When adult Adam turns off the jet and then young Adam just repeats the phrase "Oh my God" over and over at a normal volume. Of course it's quite funny, but in this specific case it destroys the credibility of the reality of the plot. A real-looking reaction for me would have been: "Oh my God, you're crazy!" and a little louder and more desperate. Otherwise, the comedy in the film is okay. Which is also unrealistic: Apparently, even Adam's father can't properly shut down the particle accelerator, even when it's intact, even though he invented it himself. Instead, the crystal hard drive apparently has to be removed, which may lead to a meltdown. This is also remarkable, because research was currently being carried out on a hard drive made of nanocrystals in 2018 (where the scene takes place), i.e. There was and still is no finished product that could be used productively as shown in the film. So as I said, no serious SciFi but an entertaining action comedy with SciFi elements.Incidentally, I think it's a shame that more and more large productions are only available as streams and not in the cinema, where it would be much more fun for me personally!

title: Great Ryan Reynolds Movie
text: This movie was good fun. Ryan Reynolds and the little kid were great together. Witty, hilarious dialogue. Good story telling and some entertaining action scenes! Well done!

title: I waited for this film...and it was worth the wait!
text: We need more films like this. It seems to me Ryan Reynolds is in a great groove and I hope and wonder if he is going to top himself. So proud that he is Canadian. His choices along with director, actor and story are on point.This film is fun for the whole family. It has something for everyone. I cannot understand how some reviews are negative at all. I think some people see too many movies and become way to critical. I watched this with my daughter who happens to be a great audience and participates when the moment arises. We laughed. We got choked up. We clapped, cheered.This is the kind of movie the creators set out to make. I will say that I thought the first half was better then the second. But just by a very little. Cause it comes to a great conclusion. Because of that my rating is a little low. But not by much. Totally worth the watch. This is not a film to be dissected over it's science facts and believability. It's a movie. A place we go to escape. And escape I did. I hate when people come out of a film like TRANSFORMERS saying how unbelievable it was. Really...you just went in to see a movie about Robot's in disguise? You are not going to get Shakespeare. So watching this film you should know what you are walking into from watching the trailer or reading a synopsis.I had a constant smile from the beginning of this movie and wanted more, and was hoping that it didn't take a turn and become a bad movie. And this is the kind of content we are getting from a streaming service. Wow. I will be watching this again. In fact I've watched any clip that comes up on YouTube which refers to anything to do with this film. I think the young actor in this film did great. And would love to see more of him. And who, who doesn't want to see more of Ryan. Ever since he stepped infront of a camera you knew that's were he was suppose to be. If I could give HALVES on IMDB, I'm so close to giving this film and 8.5. So will say that I give this film an 8-8.5 our of 10. - Toronto, Canada.

title: A Future Me Will Want to Rewatch It!!
text: Watched it with family members who were 12,18s,40s and 50s and all of us enjoyed this movie.It's a great family time travel-type movie with a good amount of action, nice story, great cinematography, acting and directing. A good amount of humor, love story and ass-kicking made it that a future me at some point in the future will watch it again. Oh, it's on NETFLIX!! Isn't that amazing?!!

title: Absolutely loved it!
text: This is a great movie, Me and my wife really enjoyed watching it! I love anything to do with time travel and this one did not disappoint! The whole movie kept me drawn in and it had a good amount of action and it was really funny! Highly recommend watching this film! 10/10.

title: Surprisingly good
text: This kid playing the younger Adam and Reynolds playing the older one both riffing on each other is hilarious. This is a good amount of action, humor and feels all wrapped up in a good tale. Watch it. You wont regret it.

title: Great fun movie
text: Well balanced with alot of fun and laughter. Im not much for scfi type of movies but this one rocked. Also the soundtrack is pretty good too can't go wrong with Boston 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

title: It's like Ryan can't do no wrong
text: So everyone knows Ryan Reynolds's is usually in these funny, sarcastic roles. But seriously, this guy can't go wrong. I hope he breaks out into more dramatic roles because this guy is on the way to an Oscar. And honestly, I don't want anyone else besides him for this sassy characters lol He delivers his comedy so precise it's crazy. This movie is a kids action movie, just some added adult humour. It's a good watch. The perfect pick me up for those lazy rainy days.

title: Enjoyable Sci Fi
text: This movie is by all means no masterpiece but I don't think that's what they intended when they shot it.Funny, interesting sci fi with great cast. The time passed without me wanting to fast forward, not once, what is a rare thing for me.Extra credit to young Adam who is adorable and a great actor!

title: Awesome
text: We absolutely loved it. Not sure how anyone could give this movie less than a ten. Ryan Reynolds was hilarious, and the boy who played him as a kid was spot on.

title: Two Thumbs Up
text: This is one of those Netflix movies that I have enjoyed. Not that there are many in my opinion Netflix is a hit or miss most of the time. This one is definitely a hit. It is an original idea as far as I know Have not really seen anything to similar that I can compare it to. This hits all the emotional points it will have you laughing all the way to sadness. I would recommend this movie to everyone if you have not seen it yet. Definitely a Netflix movie I keep on my watchlist.

title: A Fun, Thrilling Experience
text: Watching Shawn Levy's sci-fi action comedy The Adam Project is a fun, thrilling experience. The concept of the film is clever: a fighter pilot travels back to a specific point in his life, only to meet (and bond with) his younger self. The always-charming Ryan Reynolds is our leading man, playing the grown-up version of Adam Reed. Reynolds continues to prove he knows a thing or two about being funny. Here, his comedic timing is sharper than ever, evident each time he delivers hilarious lines of dialogue. The pairing of Reynolds with young actor Walker Scobell (who plays a 12-year old version of Adam Reed) creates a fantastic comedic duo. Their dynamic is very enjoyable to watch. They are surrounded by an all-star cast, appearing mostly in supporting roles, including Mark Ruffalo and Jennifer Garner (both should've been given more screen time), and a devilish performance by Catherine Keener as an ultra-villain who you will love to hate. At the heart of the film, this is a good vs. Evil story that feels familiar yet comforting. The film rises above similar movies because of the excellent script (I was surprised to find out that four very acclaimed screenwriters worked on this screenplay; the films feels very cohesive as if it were penned by a single writer and not a team) and terrific direction. The movie moves quickly, never allowing the momentum to slow to a dull roar. Instead, we're at full throttle for most of the film. Levy does allow his actors to have a few tender moments, but bookends them with some awesome action sequences infused with terrific humor. As a result, The Adam Project will leave a smile on your face.

title: Really good, made me laugh and cry.
text: Just finished watching this, it hit home as i lost my mum a year ago and its still really hard, so a lot of sentiment was there. The comedy was spot on too (if you like Ryan Reynolds type of comedy! Which i do!) the film actually felt short there needed to be more. Which is the opposite from yesterday when i saw that dismal excuse of a film the batman which went on forever and a day!

title: Great movie.
text: Really enjoyed this movie. I think a lot of people will overthink it and go off on their high horses. But times just take a seat and enjoy the adventure.I've got to say the actor playing young Adam, really killed it, for his first big break out role he really smashed it. Big bright future for him. Re olds definitely tone down his usual sarcastic remarks to a level that just tolerable.All and all I really liked this movie.

title: Derivative, but fun and entertaining nevertheless
text: There are obvious "borrows" from big name movies and genres, but in a way, that is what makes this even funnier.... Kind of a knowing wink....to the Star Wars light saber battles, James Bond villain's lair about to self-destruct, the Star Wars Hans Solo amazing flyboy abilities to evade the superior villain, etc. Along with the action, there's enough humor sprinkled throughout to keep it fun and not too heavy, but there's enough genuine feeling injected to not make it feel like total fluff. Thoroughly enjoyed it.... Just don't go in expecting anything deep.

title: How to break the rules of time travel
text:
Kudos to the young actor playing the 12-year-old Ryan Reynolds! Absolutely fabulous performance!Do not get your hopes up about the teaming up of Garner and Ruffalo again since 13 Going On 30 as they only share screen time for a minute! And now to the film itself...
Adult Adam steals a jet to travel back to 2018 but ends up in 2022 face-to-face with his 12-year-old self: a small, little bullied school kid raised by his single, hard-working mother. Neither of them disintegrate when meeting, nor does existence end like Back to the Future lore made us believe. Instead, a series of comedic events sees the adult and child work together to solve the problem of time travel.Adult Adam is on a mission to find his girlfriend, Saldaña, but is being chased fervently by his dad's old boss. As the adventure progresses double-crosses, murder and a Biff-esque investment plot becomes known to both the audience and Adamses (?). History will be changed and the future will be unknown once again, I think. The details of "and then" are left to our inner detectives to solve.All-in-all a great romp through comedy, action and heart-felt family love.

title: Great movie
text: This was a fun movie to watch.It is about time travel, mixed with some sci-fi and a little bit of Star Wars (the light saber reminded me of it).Great acting from all involved. Watch this movie everyone! It will make you laugh for sure.Overall good movie!

title: A really fun and well-acted sick-fi flick
text: I'm usually pretty critical of movies, but this one was a lot of fun to watch. Great praise to Walter Scobell for his acting skills. I was blown away by how well he played his character, and was immediately laughing because of how well he pulled off his mannerisms and facial expressions.There were some pretty predictable parts, but I wasn't expecting the movie to be filled with crazy plot twists. I wouldn't recommend it for kids due to language and some pretty intense themes, but teens and adults will definitely enjoy! If you like sci-fi and all the nostalgia of references to your favorite classics, this will be a lot of fun to watch.

title: Classic Ryan Reynolds..
text: Like a family-friendly Deadpool. The merc with a mouth but PG with good tear-jerker moments while at the same time being lighthearted. Enjoyed this thoroughly.

title: So fun!
text: What fools have this movie a 1? This classic Ryan Reynolds solid entertainment. Good storyline that has you thinking because what time travel movie doesn't? Fun action scenes for sure and great actors, definitely watch!

title: A blockbuster with heart and soul
text: Surprisingly remarkable. I was honestly expecting an average action sci fi movie and I really wasn't expecting the story to move me in such a way. Great dialogue, really funny jokes (something not as easy to achieve as many might think) and a great combination of good story telling, great cast and visual spectacularity. Superb job, guys.

title: An amazing time travel movie about masculinity.
text: Every father and son should see this movie together, or alone.The best of time travel movies mixed with a dash of Star Wars and the meaning and purpose of being a boy, man and father in one amazingly captivating, humorus, sci-fi movie. Just what the world needs in age of anti-male, missing father U. S. culture.

title: Amazing
text: This movie took the opportunity to use time travel as the context for an emotional healing journey. With just the right amount of action and comedy. Those who are emotionally intelligent will appreciate this!

title: Just Great Fun, entertaining and love the Humor !!
text:
We've watched several times just for the pure entrainment, humor and fun ... it's a great way to let down with the family after a long day !!!!We love Ryan Reynolds humor add Mark Ruffalo and Jennifer Garner .... What fun and the new actor playing younger Adam is great too
Just enjoy I recommend everyone stop dissecting we need these opportunities of laughter !

title: FANTASTIC
text: The modern day Back To The Future. Best thing I've watched in a long time, PLUS it has Ryan Rynolds. Can't ask for better than that. This is a definite must watch and rewatch.

title: Not one boring second!
text: Stop reading bad reviews. It's like these people watch to find flaws in films. I watch to have fun and it was enjoyable! I usually hate it when films don't properly understand the concept of time travel but I'd say this movie gets it! Or at least they did their best.Ryan Reynolds is funny, as usual, and the kid they got is good at acting too. Plus Mark Ruffalo and Jennifer Garner! Man, I squealed the entire time when they were together.Easy 10 for me!

title: Ryan The Eye Candy
text: I would definitely recommend The Adam Project if you want an enjoyable movie night at home. I had a very good time watching it. And of course, Ryan is an eye candy throughout the movie. He is very pleasing to watch. The little actor was quiete talented. Overall, do not miss this one if you like the genre.

title: An enjoyable adventure
text: The Adam Project suprised me. Decent acting and a decent story and not as much action as you would expect which was nice. Some characters feel underused but they make an impression while they're there.I was suprised by the CGI as well. Theres obviously a good bit of CGI in it but it isn't too noticeable. Don't get me wrong, you notice it at some points but it's worth mentioning this movie has better CGI with a 116 million budget than Red Notice did with a 200 million budget.To summarize, it's a movie worth checking out. Fun and enjoyable.Also a reminder: Not every movie has to be Tarantino/Fincher/Villenuve/Scorsese level of good for it to be a good movie.

title: Good
text: This is about a guy who has to travel back to the past to stop time travel from being invented. Ryan Reynolds stars as the main character who revisits his former home in the year 2022 on his way to 2018 and picks up his 12 year old self. Very entertaining lots of action and not too much "nerdy" stuff. Funny at times and over all a good movie.

title: Funny, Exciting and Endearing all at the same time
text: I watched this movie with my husband and 12 year old son. We all adore Ryan Reynolds. Who doesn't, right? This movie turned out to be so much more than what we were expecting. I laughed, I cried, I was impressed by the special effects. The boy who was Ryan's younger self was so spot on. Their chemistry was amazing. Wonderful story, great acting, great actors. And of course don't forget the incredible Jennifer Garner! What was going on between Jennifer Garner and young Walker Scobell was breaking my heart. As I am sitting next to my 12 year old son tears are streaming down my face. The story was just very relatable. So enjoyable. So funny. And who doesn't mind looking at Ryan Reynolds for 2 hours! It's a must watch.

title: Our name is Adam
text: This movie is such fun movie. The acting is amazing, but that's not surprising with this amazing cast. You'll laugh and you'll cry while watching this family friendly, action packed, sci-fi movie! Don't skip it because of some of these negative reviews; this movie is definitely worth the watch!

title: fun-filled touchy Sci fi
text: Not too deep story line like Nolan verse. But Still a fun to watch with a very subtle message on loving your parents as long as you have them with you.

title: Nice movie
text: The movie is very interesting. The cast is fantastic but the story is a little bit old . The events were so fast , it would have been a lot better if the movie was longer.

title: Good Smart Sci Fi Comedy with Heart
text: This is a nice feel good comedy with heart and a good Sci Fi script. Ryan Reynolds is perfectly cast and brings the best out in the main character. The whole cast hit the nail on the head.

title: Enjoyed it more than I thought I would
text: The idea of seeing a young Ryan Reynolds with an older one was a lot of fun and the roasting back and forth was great, since the many bad things said to a kid made me laugh as "Well, you COULD say that to YOURSELF". The kid had also been cast very well and his deliveries for Ryan type lines were genuinely believable.The action was fun and for those who want some wholesome moments too, there's that too, even if I wasn't really necessary a huge fan of the sappy moments. Still, those weren't in too big supply.Good, fun movie!

title: Enjoyable flick
text: We watched this one night, wanting something fun and knowing we all love ryan reynolds. We all enjoyed it immensely. Nothing bad to say about it, honestly.

title: Wholesome, heartwarming, and fun
text: I laughed quite a lot, I cried a little, and mostly I was really impressed with the kid. Walker Scobell has a bright future ahead of him, and was PERFECTLY cast as a 12 year-old Ryan Reynolds.It has its flaws, but was genuinely enjoyable if you don't try to poke holes in the science and put a microscope on the cgi.

title: BRILLIANT!!!!
text: To have a film make me feel this good after covid deserves a sequel... if that's possible.Reynolds and the cast did a great job in creating something special like this 👍🏼

title: Funny and emotional
text: First of all big fans of all the actors and this movie I do feel like there was too much going on that we didn't get to know the characters well, other than that for being a time travel movie it was good. It had humor and action, and I was crying every time Mark Ruffalo came on!!!

title: Instant Sci-fi Classic
text: This was a welcomed breath of fresh air in a sea of Hollywood rotten eggs. It has a good family fun vibe with the right amount of sarcastic humor and special effects. The banter between Adam and Adam was rich and the other cast did a good job of supporting that humor. It won't win any Oscars but given what passes for Oscar material these days that's not such a bad thing.

title: GREAT!!
text: I've always liked Ryan Reynolds but this movie is the best one I've seen him in. Great from start to finish. Walker Scobell have a great performance. Funny with some tear jerking moments.

title: Directing, editing, acting....
text: This cinematic dance exudes a balance hard sought in current films, using a scientific premise intertwined with heartfelt emotion, delivered with impeccable comic timing. The cooks in this kitchen must have enjoyed each other's company, cause it shows.

title: 10 stars I can't stand haters.
text: Is this actually 10 stars? No. I guess I just get fed up with whiny people who can't sit back and enjoy a movie without finding something to complain about. I thought the story was solid. Action, comedy, and just enough emotional depth to keep it from feeling hollow. Why people who don't like Ryan Reynolds, still watch his movies, is confusing to me. Honest grade? 7.5.

title: Time travel and a bloke flick.
text: I normally don't like time travel use in a lot of movies.This one is done right.The perfect amount of Sci fi injected into a great movie as a vehicle to carry an even better and fresher version of a bloke flick genre that deals with "daddy issues" to "Midlife crisis" and everything in between the two.Addd a pinch of existentialism....voila.

title: I'm emotional so, I'll give it a ten
text: Yes, it has it flaws like every movie. Yes Ryan Reynolds is playing the same character, at this point they make characters based of his personality I think. BUt really, this was somehow different, and I think that somehow was this 12 year old boy. He's a great actor, and he was the bonus of the movie. The chemistry between the duo is great. It makes such an entertaining and emotional movie to watch, that everyone is going to enjoy. Is not made to revolutionate the sci-fi cinema, but it's made to make you have a great, and if that's the case a nostalgic time like I did. Good movie!

title: Another one!
text: Ryan Reynolds hits another homerun! I think this movie really hits home and as usual is of superb quality like all of Ryan Reynolds latest projects. Here is to many more!

title: Sci-fi time travel action with the typical Reynolds homour for the whole family
text: The film was amazing, I expected alot of comedy but genuinely enjoyed the laughs. The action is very entertaining and the special effects were very realistic.I think the most impressive thing about this movie is how such a complicated storyline was simplified simplified and fun. Top marks.

title: This is the Best Ryan Reynolds movie... Sorry Deadpool fans
text: If you're a big fan of Ryan Reynolds like I am than you really need to watch this. Lots of humor through out, great action, and who doesn't like time travel. It has the laughs, the wows, the surprises, and the tears all in one. Can't wait to watch again.

title: Review
text: The adam project was starred r. Reynolds in one of his career highlights. He played the hero again. The film covers how these guys adopted an old loyal dog from the railway yard (near the towns 2 story circle k). They'd put the dog to work out there, had him cut off door knobs with a truck saw. Anyway this faithful dog starts a new life, his new owners put a healthy picture of Wyoming just over his bed. The dog would alert the men that it was time for lunch with one heavy bark that made the birds outside take flight. Then they would all be sitting in Dennys for lunch where the dog would sometimes also realease a strong bark. If he did, it would usually cause a bearded man (reading the times) to lose a spill of his coffee. The man would turn and say, "shut him up."

title: Fun
text: Really enjoyed this. Ryan Reynolds is just himself again. Real star is the kid playing the younger version of him. He had the cadence and just behaved like Ryan does.Sometimes you just want a fun movie and this was one.

title: Simply Beautiful
text: The movie by itself is good, the young adam "Walker scabell" imitates Reynolds more than Reynolds himself. The movie raises so many questions, to be honest here, the story of the movie or what we call " Climax " is not so strong to have all the sacrifices. Cinematography was missing in most part of the movie, no light nor a defined color palette.But to summarize the movie with one sentence."Short average but funny snd bitter story.

title: Van Wilder in a space ship, with A list cast
text: It's Ryan Reynolds, aka the hot Adam Sandler. He's been doing the same bit since Van Wilder and the whole if it ain't broke don't fix it thing has been churning out the goods for so long you don't mind that they now quote his other movies' catchphrases. It helps to have an absolute A list cast. And although they really don't too have much to work with other than time traveling daddy issues, they deliver all that they need to when they need to in several scenes and much dialogue with poignancy, affection, rapport, and humor. And the kid is just great as Jr. Ryan Reynolds. The whole thing moves along quickly helped with better than expected Netflix CGI.

title: Fantastic movie
text: I love time travel entertainment, and this movie had me laughing really loud, crying and stuff loved it very very much. It has everything the modern movies have, lots of action, great CGI.The comedy is too good too, i laughed so hard, good thing i was home alone.Recommend this movie a million times, and the cast was perfect too.

title: The film surely exceeds my expectation!!
text: The Adam Project is a science-fiction action comedy film directed by Shawn Levy. The film stars Ryan Reynolds, Walker Scobell, Mark Ruffalo, Jennifer Garner, Catherine Keener and Zoe Saldaña.Time-travelling fighter pilot Adam Reed teams up with his 12-year-old self for a mission to save the future after unintentionally crash landing in 2022.Whatever Film critics say bad about this film i really liked this film. The film has some great acting, some really funny scenes, making most out of a predictable plot, superb use of VFX and a perfect amount of amount of seriousness and humor.The plot of the film is decent yet predictable but the execution is superb. The film keeps you engaged throughout and from no where the film or any of it's scene looks lethargic or forced upon.The screenplay of the film is gripping and has a regular dose of fun in between. The film has all the necessary elements to keep you glued throughout.Acting is superb, Ryan Reynolds is great in his character, Mark Ruffalo is my favorite. Jennifer Garner, Zoe and Catherine Keener were all impressive in their respective roles. Walker Scobell is a surprise factor and really impresses in his debut.The climax of the film is predictable but good and i would like to strongly recommend this film. A must watch.

title: Enjoyed it
text: I thoroughly enjoyed this. It was funny and charming. I don't know who coached the kid, but he did an excellent job. I would watch again. The only cringe part was the CGI of the antagonist face when they showed her younger self.

title: Fun and entertaining
text: It's a good little film if you don't approach it too clinically, thought it was a nice story line, some emotion in places and typical humour you would expect.Think we'll be seeing young Adam in many films to come.

title: Don't mind the Action
text:
I'll keep it short;
I lost a parent at 12 and this made me relate and tear up (a 33yo/m) a couple of times. The story isn't incredible, but the characters and their interaction. Why does it have to be either/or in blockbuster movies? I felt for all the main characters. Even understood the villains motive. If only the main henchman had got some backstory screentime.

title: Obsessed with this movie! Loved every minute of it!
text: When it comes to comedy shows or comedy movies, I hate watching them. In fact it's my least favorite genre to exist, but there's something about Ryan Reynolds that makes me never want to pass up a movie he's in-comedy or not. Not only is Ryan Reynolds the absolute best, but the young boy actor in the movie (Walker Scobell) was able to encapsulate Ryan's personality to a T! Don't take the movie too seriously. It's meant to be fun, lighthearted, full of action, sci-fi, and excitement. I laughed a lot and cried a little! If you're going to watch it with kids, be aware that it does contain profanity, but that doesn't stop it from being a great heartfelt movie!

title: A mashup of a mashup of a mashup
text: Simple and fun movie. The snarky sarcastic Adams coupled with any number of sci-fi movies from the past 40 years, coupled with a collection of great music throughout will appeal to a wide audience. The music tie in is formulaic that has worked with Guardians of the Galaxy and other movies. Scenes looking like ET, Tron, Starwars, Back To The Future, Guardians, Terminator...and probably a number of others will take you back. Sit back and just enjoy it..and dot over think it.

title: A really great and funny Sci-Fi-Adventure
text: I watched "The Adam Project" today. The film surprised me absolutely positively. I'm always a little skeptical about Netflix movies, but here the skepticism was really misplaced.A really great sci-fi adventure film. I especially liked the sci-fi elements, i.e. The futuristic spaceships, the weapons, the fights and the gadgets. The computer effects of the sci-fi elements were also great to watch.I also really really liked the music. Epochal and soulful in equal measure. Really great!Soundwise also pretty good for Netflix standards. Decent soundscape and rich bass and also a lot of surround sound.Ryan Reynolds and Walker Scobell really both did a great job here and obviously had a lot of fun filming. I also really liked Mark Ruffallo here.On the negative side, some of the typical Reynolds fecal humor could be laid out. Sometimes the jokes are a bit inappropriate. But the humor is kept in check. I expected worse. The film can be serious, too, and I liked that.In addition, the film has one or two logic gaps. And here and there the actions of the characters are illogical, where I think: this could have been done much better in a different way.Overall, however, despite the small weaknesses a really great and fun sci-fi adventure film for the whole family! In any case, a big recommendation for all who have Netflix anyway. I would have loved to see the movie in theaters as well, because it would have been worth it.In any case, I will watch the movie more often, because the rewatch value is there.8/10 points - Medium rewatch value.

title: It works
text: Honestly I had my doubts about his movie after watching the trailer. However, I'm a big fan of Reynolds and with cast including Saldana and Ruffalo so gave it go. My doubts were based around the workability of a young actor playing a younger Reynolds, and the cheese factor. Scobell nailed it though and owned the movie. Some reviews criticise the special effects and settings, but the film succeeds at being what it arguably meant to be... an enjoyable family fun adventure. Okay the cgi was weak in some places, specifically in the de-aging of Keener which reminded me of the cgi recreation of Peter Cushing in the Later Star Wars movies, however even this fit in with the numerous Star Wars Easter eggs of the film (light-sabres, the forest chase scene). Overall it was a great movie with some real laugh out loud moments combined with some tear jerking moments. The casting is excellent and bounced off each other fantastically. Give it a go.

title: Turned out more than great.
text: Started off way too fast-paced, but it caught itself, then followed by rushing the ending before a heart-warming epilogue. Overall more than satisfactory storyline, action sequences, a few one-liners, and acting that doesn't disappoint on any scale. Plays off nicely.

title: Only thing not to like is the villain
text: Love the story, love the characters- yes they even made a villain you love to hate and loved the bittersweet ending.It actually has a little bit of everything. The love story, personal development, family, action and time travel.If you haven't seen it yet just get to it already.

title: Not perfect but sweet
text: The movie goes pretty smoothly but ends a little too quickly. The final battle comes all too quick but resolves all too easily. However the cast all execute their parts excellently. Walker Scobell does an excellent job portraying everyone's loved Ryan Reynolds right from the beginning, nailing his persona on the head. Action and fight scenes are pretty good There's absolutely no reason to rate this a 1/10. True rating is probably a 7 but to offsetthe ivory ratings, I'm rating this a 10. Yes a good emotional movie, so see it.

title: You won't be let down!!!
text: Typically when you see a movie with this much star power it can be difficult to give everyone meaningful screen time, but this film does it beautifully with enough power behind each scene.Ofcourse, you'll find some "typical" Hollywood moments but this movie is unique in the ways that it sets its movie. Personally it had an eloquent way of pulling emotions out of you.You will feel laughter, joy, sadness, hope and even bursts of adrenaline.A great balance of action and storyline, to which I give so much credit to the actors.Yes, one or two of the characters left a little to be desired but again the actors did a great job.I won't give anything away because I hate spoilers and to that I say watch it, enjoy it for what it is.Too often we try to compare one movie to another and forget that every movie has its own essence.Trust me you will love this Film.

title: Loved it
text: Loved it. Light fun, humorous and touching. Nice mix.Fun characters the are relevant to the story line.RR knows how to make a fun movie. Feel good and easy to follow...gets a little boggy about 3/4 thru for just a bit.

title: Funny adult family movie
text: Great and funny movie with a lots of action and some serious emotional parts. Walker Scobell definitely stole the show and out did Ryan Reynolds in a comedic performance. Definitely a must watch.

title: Fun little time travel movie, not entirely logical, of course...
text: This is a fun little time travel movie, with nice relationships between the principal characters. Link most time-travel movies there are plenty of logical holes of course.In view of Ryan Reynolds' part ownership of Wrexham Football Club, I was amused to see that the movie has Welsh subtitles on Netflix, which taught me a few expletives I didn't know before!

title: AMAZING
text: Words can't even describe how breathtaking this film was. I wish I could watch it for the first time again. It was amazing and I loved every single second of it!

title: Ryan Reynolds best movie?
text: Time traveling movies are always tricky but there were no obvious plot holes (e.g. Looper) and the action sequences are top notch . The emotional scenes between father/son and husband/wife work well due to the pervasive good acting. Sprinkle in some nice humor and you've got yourself a winner.Additionally, the movie doesn't push any political agenda, which is a breath of fresh air, and if it weren't for the strong language it would've been a movie I could've watched with my 1st grader. Nice job Netflix!

title: Very easy weekend night, yes please
text: Saw the trailer and thought 'oh god yet another action snooze fest'. It's a simple movie but quite enjoyable. Fast paced dialogs and solid Ryan Reynolds humour. The script is a reheated dish but the sides are so delicious it surprisingly makes for a very nice experience. Doesn't feel as designed by a marketing team as the latest Spider-Man. (even though I'm sure it was). If you have a night off and just want to relax this is an ok place.

title: A good watch
text: Of course I love Ryan Reynolds so this is definitely a good watch if you are a fan.Good fight scenes and cgi and even had some funny parts in there mainly from walker scafell which was surprising as i don't usually find kids that whitty.The other thing that I thought was a little over acted where the romantic scenes .All round good film I would recommend.

title: Thos movie is something else
text: I'm going to say that I have been impressed with Netflix films lately, the directing, writing, cinematography, acting and stunt work. This movie is filled with nostalgia but at the same time, its new! Young adam is played so well in this movie, to be his film debut is extremely impressive. The chemistry between him and Ryan Reynolds is outstanding, they bring out emotions in each other, they play off each other and act like best friends, brothers and even a father son thing although they play the same part only 28 years different. The chemistry between Mark Ruffalo and Reynolds is amazing, they have some emotional scenes that bring a tear out. Jennifer garner is great as usual in this type of role, she plays a great mom and her role in the film was well done.The action scenes are top notch, the camera work is so good, from fight scenes to car chase scenes, use of drones is amazing now a days, Shawn Levy as director is awesome, he knows how to direct a movie. My only gripe about the movie is that Zoe Saldana wasnt in it enough, her acting was great but not enough screen time.Other then that, the movie is near perfectGrab some popcorn, watch in 4k and be amazed.

title: Ryan
text: Ryyan is just so genuine, credible and funny that he can make any movie watchable. Love him as an actor.The kid who this movie is also very cool.Good sci-fi/action flick.

title: i like the movie
text: Personally I like the movie , The time format can be more explanative but still its a one time watch movie , All cast done their work good.... Actually the movie is good if u get bored and watch some sci fi movie then u can prefer this.

title: Amusing and clever. All time travel movies have logic problems.
text: I laughed out loud a number of times. Good action sequences.As noted in my headline all time travel movies have flaws, by necessity.I thoroughly enjoyed it. All the main characters did a good job and looked like they were having fun.Put logic on the back burner about time travel and just enjoy it.

title: True Family Fun that's Smart
text: Nothing to insult your intelligence here like so many science fiction films today.Fun dialogue, nice performances, and a solid story along with smart directing make this one worth watching.

title: Its a great movie!
text: I did enjoy watching this film I just wish we got to see the future. In a film with time travel but no look at the future is basically like looking at an awesome crazy sports car and then revving the engine to find out its electric.I also hate it when movies have to have a 5 minute scene of kissing. Its cringe as hell and if you find it satisfying to watch people getting off then you're the type of person who enjoys 3rd wheeling. There is a reason 3s a crowed. If there was people 2 people kissing in the same room as me I aint gonna sit there looking at them so I why the hell would I want to watch it on TV?The film is mostly predictable. However it is a good movie overall. I laughed at allot of the jokes and I am a sucker for special FX. When I see awesome CGI my eyes light up like a kid who has just been given a games console with every video game ever made stored on it. The actors in this film did a great job. I would highly recommend watching this.

title: An Entertaining Sci-Fi Time Travel Film.
text: Watched The Adam Project with Ryan Reynolds(Deadpool 2) as Adam Reed, Walker Scobell as Young Adam Reed, Mark Ruffalo(Dark Waters) as Louis Reed, Zoe Saldana(Vivo) as Laura Shane, Jennifer Garner(Alias,Peppermint) as Ellie Reed, Alex Mallari Jr.(Code 8) as Christos and Catherine Keener(Being John Malkovich) as Maya Sorian.The Film was entertaining its gets by with entertaining action and a likeable cast as well have some emotional moments as well a phenemonal performance from breakout actor Walker Scobell .An Entertaining Sci-Fi Time Travel Film. Really happy Shawn Levy has taken over Deadpool 3.Score By Rob Simonsen(Ghostbusters: Afterlife) , Cinematography By Tobias Schliessler(Spenser Confidential), Direction By Shawn Levy(Free Guy) An Entertaining Sci-Fi Time Travel Film. 8/10.

title: Finally, entertainment in its purest form
text: Very enjoyable movie for all ages with GREAT wit and humor carrying it all the way through along with solid messages of family...I'm sure their is a segment of youth totally bored by it; but after COVID, the economy and so much Hollywood mayhem and murder? I found it refreshingly honest and poignant while fun and entertaining - which is really why we USE to go "to the movies" - to be entertained. The home setting and entire geography "fit" every piece of the story. The cinematography was well done.Mark Ruffalo surprised me entirely. The usually serious, intense actor showed a humorous side that was totally fun to see! (Who would have thought?!) The rest of the cast was equal in humor - Jennifer Garner and of course, the charming Ryan Reynolds who spews wit naturally without having to think twice. I loved Zoe Saldana once again; she's just a charmer no matter what role she plays, whether "Guardians of the Galaxy" or "Avatar" she "wears" her roles with real natural talent. Honest to God, its about time we had a movie that was blessed with continual movement in a storyline that is FUN and SHEER entertainment along with subtle messages of fatherhood as well as giving a glimpse of a kid growing up without a Dad - the feelings one has when there is loss of that all important figurehead yet finally becoming a man himself and getting a glimpse of what was and what might have been.

title: FUN ACTION PACKED
text: Movie reminds me of the movies from when I was a kid, of course Back to the future, come to mind. Definitely a great family movie, funny, action packed, keeps you interest. Ryan Renolds always keeps me smiling throughout. Love the kid, definitely had great comedic timing.

title: Cute movie but...
text: I always thought Shawn Levy made good family films. So I was excited to see Adam and Shawn team up after "Free Guy." However, I was shocked at how many times they used the Lord's name in vain. It certainly didn't add to the movie. I would have given this 10 stars, but that bothered me. Im sure there are many of you whose opinion will differ from mine and that's ok. I just thought I'd give others a heads up. Cute movie overall just sad about the language used.

title: So good! 4/5 (spoiler free review)
text:
Short Version:
Lets keep this quick.This is a great sci-fi and it is worth a shot if you like action or action comedies.Long Version:
So i guess i will write down who will enjoy this and the ones who wont.Will Enjoy:Teenagers that are into scifi.Anyone into scifi.Back to the future fans.People who are into cool special effects + explosions and cool fight sequences.People who like action-comedies
Fans of ryan reynoldsWill not enjoy:
People who do not like fighting in movies
People who do not enjoy time travel
People who do not like over the top effects (why would anyone not like this?!)

title: The gift thats keeps on giving
text: Reynolds hasn't let me down yet, i have managed to laugh at every single one of his movies. I love how the kid who plays a young Adam has studied Reynolds funny querks to the T! The perfect choice of actor in my eyes and i'm sure he will go on to have a brilliant career. Reynolds is just the gift that keeps giving! Such a legend of comedy yet always manages to put a little heart and emotion in the mix too. Bravo.

title: Solid movie
text: Probably my favorite action movie of the year. More well rounded and better executed plot than "Free Guy" .They could have had more gore and adult language to make it rated R, and if young Adam wasn't cussing, it could have been close to PG.If it wasn't for that, I would say it's a great family movie with positive moral lessons.

title: Great if your a kid or a kid at heart
text: Just plain fun. Lots of action and who can't love a little version of Ryan. Tear jerker for sure. Predictable ending but still fun is the key word. Just watch and enjoy.

title: Great movie.
text: We enjoy the movie, is always people who hate Netflix well don't use it. That's been said the movie is really entertaining a good movie for the whole family .The special effects are awesome. Ryan is an entertaining guy. Hope we can continue getting movies like that .Also have a very interesting message for who have kids.

title: So refreshing.
text: Heartwarming, thrilling, and comedic. Back to the Future meets Time Cop meets Guardians of the Galaxy. Good music, good action, good story line, and good acting. I would recommend this movie to many. We all think of what might happen if we could change the past. Good movie.

title: Better than expected
text: Having read the synopses, I was not expecting much, instead got a pretty good movie. Fun to watch, and Reynolds is funny as always.Lots of plot holes, but, ignore them and just enjoy what's there. ^_^

title: Great action movie with lovable characters
text: I loved this movie from beginning to end. Wasn't expecting to feel a bit emotional during some scenes. The action is good and cool. Liked it a lot!If you like Ryan Reynolds kind of humor, you're bound to have a good time. Falls in the same vibe as Red Notice, 6 Underground. Give me a movie like this every night of the week.

title: Super fun
text: Ryan Reynolds plays himself every time and the thing is it works. The movie has minimal depth and the plot was stretched super thing, but again, it's the anodyne needed for these turbulent times.

title: Netflix Standout
text: I have a hard time finding Netflix original movies that I enjoy. They either have a pacing or structure problem that makes them basically unwatchable for me.I watched The Adam Project hoping that wouldn't be true and scored big. Disclosure, I like Ryan Reynolds' brand of humor, and it was quite evident here.It's entertaining from start to finish, has all the love stories (father-son, romantic, loving one's self), fighting, explosions, time travel worldbuilding that didn't make me mad, and ***SPOILER*** (sort of but not really) a happy ending that included some very nice wind down/wrap up with the characters.Was it epic? Deeply moving? Nah. But it was absolutely entertaining, warm, funny, and good enough I watched it twice. (Hence my 10 rating; 10s are movies I re-watch). It's exactly the kind of movie I wish Netflix would make more of.

title: Touching and solid
text: Good movie, made me shed a tear, nothing great but a damn good watch. I hope more people watch it and feel the same way I do. As far as a Netflix movie it's phenomenal, no gay sex and no underage crap.

title: Funny emotional time travel movie
text: Right off the bat if you dont like Ryan Reynolds then you shouldn't watch this. Ignore the reviews about ryan basically carrying the movie or its centered around him. This movie has a clever way of making you laugh alot and cry on a few occasions but you'll also be taken on a fun ride with welcome resemblances from return of the jedi, guardians of the galaxy, flight of the navigator, top gun to name but a few .so if you fancy 105 minutes of scifi action comedy with a touch of emotion then this is 4 u but from my opinion just watch it, you won't be disappointed 😁

title: A Nice, Funny Movie
text: This movie is entertaining due to the likeability of its stars as well a fun, easygoing plot that doesn't take itself too seriously. Sometimes movies take themselves way too seriously. This one is just fun and entertaining.Reynolds plays Adam, a hot shot pilot from the year 2050 who attempts to travel back in time to prevent a miscarriage of justice. Through an error, he winds up a few years off and encounters his much younger self. Together they must travel back further to find their father.Walter Scobell is the young Adam. Zoe Saldana is Adam's wife in the past. Mark Ruffalo and Jennifer Garner are the two Adams' parents. Catherine Keener is the evil businesswomen they are all trying to stop.The byplay between older Adam and his younger self are entertaining. The movie has a lot of sweet moments as well as some good fight scenes, funny dialogue and enough action to entertain everyone.It never tries to be anything more than it is. And it's hard to not like Reynolds or the other cast members.

title: What a fun ride, well worth a look :)
text: This film left a smile on my face it was easy to watch and Ryan Reynolds as always delivered, on the other hand if you dislike Ryan Reynolds humor you might not get into the film. Mark Ruffalo was awesome as always and Zoe Saldana played her part to a tee.In fact with these 3 actors in the film it could be mistaken as an MCU spinoff.I'm not going to give the plot away aside from saying its well worth a look, its fun and genuine family entertainment, I'm wondering why it wasn't released in cinemas!I've revised my score down to an 8 after more thought I think its a solid 7.5 stars.

title: A comic sci-fi? Not really but don't miss this one
text: Looks can deceive you into thinking this is just another time traveling flick but w the cast that fills the screen of this movie you'll be far from yawning. Ryan Reynolds does an excellent job (per usual) and his younger counterpart Walker Scobell has his mannerisms and attitude down to a tee. Their interaction in itself was worth the watch but throw in Zoe Saldana, Mark Ruffalo, and Jennifer Garner and you have a must-see flick that touches the heart in many ways (right down to the casting of the dog for Hawking). Enjoy this one again and again!!

title: Netflix Family Favourite
text: We've already watched TAP three times as a family. It's a lot like Guardians of the Galaxy - funky, 80s rock vibe, a little funny, good cgi. Ryan is a good childfriendly actor and the plot is strong.

title: An energetic time traveling adventure
text: 'The Adam Project' stars Ryan Reynolds and Walker Scobell, who both play as Adam, 30 years apart from each other. When Big Adam jumps into the past using a stolen aircraft and crash lands in the timeline of his 12 year old self, they try to save the future from a megalomaniacal tech oligarch, Maya (Catherine Keener), who seeks domination and power for herself.This film has a lot of action and humor! It makes the 1hour 46minute run time an absolutely rollercoaster of witty jokes, incredible hand-to-hand combat scenes, and a unique take on the theory of time travel. Casting, acting, script, and flow are all very good!Worth a watch!

title: Fun, laughter and feels. Everything I want from a movie!
text: This is an old school, fun time travel movie with a great sense of humour and a perfect cast IMHO.No politics, no gender criticism (aka sexism and bigotry), just a fun time with some surprising emotional punches.It absolutely feels like the films we used to love as kids.I laughed, I cried, I smiled.I've missed films like this.

title: Loved this movie..
text:
I'm not sure what movie these folks who gave bad reviews were watching but this was a movie that had impact...
The little Adam was a mirror image of big Adam.. for a young actor to accomplish such a feet was amazing. Good job kid.... Ryan is as good as always.. love the whole movie.. good to see marvel actors doing something outside the MCU... loved every moment of it... I would give this movie 20 stars if I could just cause...

title: Sweet and fun
text: I feel like the bad reviews here are just picking at plot holes and the predictability of Ryan Reynolds' comedic style. There are always going to be plot holes with a sci-fi/time-travel film. Don't try to apply logic to something there isn't much real logic for.It's a really sweet story with action and comedy mixed in. Very enjoyable if you're looking for a movie to be fun, sweet, and family-friendly.

title: Another Hit by Ryan Reynolds/Shawn Levy Duo
text: Another Marvel made by Shawn Levy and Ryan Reynolds. This actor directer duo has been doing some great movies. Not the Marvel one yet. DEADPOOL, WE WAIT. But man an awesome time travel movie with a star studed cast. Ryan Reynolds works the best with these kinds of movies you know. The awesome CGI and the way they show those fancy machines. And the time paradox well that doesn't happen in the movie, you can apparently change the past to your own benefit. But not a point of criticism since, time travel is not real yet so don't know the rules. But acting Adam both young and old nailed it. This movie surprisingly had all elements to it, from romance, action, comedy and even drama and the sad emotions when you realize how you treat your mother is not something you consider,one of the most emotional scenes. Mark Ruffalo and Ryan Reynolds chemistry works out surprisingly well, the Punch on the face. Maybe hope for Hulk and Deadpool adventure. Zoe Saldana and Ryan also a good combination. The villain was a bit ok and ordinary but every other aspect of the movie just pulls out so much. Another one of RR hits after 6 Underground, Red Notice and this one. And for Shawn Levy great job after Free Guy, looking forward to the completion of triology for Deadpool and your duo.

title: Great Family Movie
text: Really not sure how anyone could not like this movie...it has action, time travel and comedy. Some of the reviews here are really ridiculous and if you just want to watch a good movie, then give it a go. Instant classic!

title: Very enjoyable
text: I'll keep this short and sweet.It's a very enjoyable movie with Ryan Reynolds not being as annoying as usual. There's good chemistry between the main characters and it moves along at a nice pace.

title: OSCAR-WORTHING MOVIE
text:
Didn't even finish watching, never had to, cuz its my pick for the oscars ....amazing( funny, ot of action and storyline like no other)
u can add how wonderfully family-oriented.

title: Bland
text: I was not engaged on any level, nor would I recommend it for family viewing. This is the epitome of "stuff you put in the background as noise while you do something else". Many cite visuals as its saving grace but Im not sure what impressive visuals people are talking about, it might have been impressive 20 years ago but I have seen same quality on tv in 2010. Then there is also the limited amount of those visuals, if you just want eye candy than there are vastly superior options out there when it comes to pure visuals.The movies problem is not that its concepts/characters being dated, its in execution of those tropes. There is clear lack of effort on the writers part.

title: Ryan Reynolds
text: Just another movie where Ryan Reynolds acts like Ryan Reynolds. What can I say? He is a great actor, but he is always the same way when he acts, kinda like The Rock. Great actors for guilty pleasure movies...

title: Ryan Reynolds doubled
text: And I liked him as a 12 yr old better. Could have been A much better movie with a better choice in actors. Saldana been there done that, Reynolds been there done that, ughh ruffalo way done that and over that political views and all he plays an annoying character. It was a cute idea but so much was stolen from other movies so it just makes itself a remake of other movies. The good part in the movie is the little boy, he's fantastic. Some of the "lessons" are good as a reminder. Meh.

title: Enjoyable
text: An entertaining film with a great cast. I'm a fan of Ryan Renolds (who is becoming my favorite actor) and Zoe Saldana. Keener, Ruffalo and Garner make up a sting supporting cast. Si-Fi with a funny, heart felt story...a fresh approach from the tiresome Star Wars stories.

title: mildly entertaining
text: The Adam Project uses Ryan Reynolds to the full extent. His verbose humor is all over the place and there are even some "emotional" moments.To be honest, almost half of the movie is worth watching. The rest is CGI, action sequences and time travel that you've already seen on screen a lot of times. Unfortunately the good and the bad parts are thoroughly mixed, so the fast-forward button comes in handy.In terms of IMDb stars, the Adam Project is in the lower part of the range.

title: Too much time to reach the real plot!
text: The plot comes together at almost half of the movie and is very predictable.. one might not have the patience to wait till this and that's what happened to me. :) I had to forward the movie and finish it. Hence the low rating..

title: pleasant in spite of the obvious
text: A pusillanimous twelve-year-old boy who's struggling to cope with a painful loss meets his older self, thus leading to a dizzying scientific adventure that could drastically alter his (their) future. Scenario is familiar, the science certainly questionable, and those intended heartfelt moments don't always come off, but it's good-natured and the relationship between Reynolds and young Scobell is a treat to watch. Mixture of the large-scale sci-fi action and the usual family drama this has a good message, though amidst the pandemonium talented supporting actors like Saldaña, Garner, and Keener deserve more to do. **½
